117.job: Senior Backend Developer - Node (100% Remote Vietnam Ho Chi Minh)
117.job_description: Join Tether and Shape the Future of Digital Finance At Tether, we’re not just building products, we’re pioneering a global financial revolution. Our cutting-edge solutions empower businesses—from exchanges and wallets to payment processors and ATMs—to seamlessly integrate reserve-backed tokens across blockchains. By harnessing the power of blockchain technology, Tether enables you to store, send, and receive digital tokens instantly, securely, and globally, all at a fraction of the cost. Transparency is the bedrock of everything we do, ensuring trust in every transaction.  Innovate with Tether Tether Finance: Our innovative product suite features the world’s most trusted stablecoin, USDT, relied upon by hundreds of millions worldwide, alongside pioneering digital asset tokenization services.  But that’s just the beginning: Tether Power: Driving sustainable growth, our energy solutions optimize excess power for Bitcoin mining using eco-friendly practices in state-of-the-art, geo-diverse facilities. Tether Data: Fueling breakthroughs in AI and peer-to-peer technology, we reduce infrastructure costs and enhance global communications with cutting-edge solutions like KEET, our flagship app that redefines secure and private data sharing. Tether Education: Democratizing access to top-tier digital learning, we empower individuals to thrive in the digital and gig economies, driving global growth and opportunity. Tether Evolution: At the intersection of technology and human potential, we are pushing the boundaries of what is possible, crafting a future where innovation and human capabilities merge in powerful, unprecedented ways.Why Join Us? Our team is a global talent powerhouse, working remotely from every corner of the world. If you’re passionate about making a mark in the fintech space, this is your opportunity to collaborate with some of the brightest minds, pushing boundaries and setting new standards. We’ve grown fast, stayed lean, and secured our place as a leader in the industry. If you have excellent English communication skills and are ready to contribute to the most innovative platform on the planet, Tether is the place for you. Are you ready to be part of the future?As a Senior Backend Developer, you will be a part of the team that works on the development of Tether backend components  New Products and Features - Tether continuously strives to create innovative new features in order to provide the most professional trading experience for customers. These are developed and deployed using agile methodologies, to ensure the user experience remains the best in the industry.Scalability - all backend services that power Tether must remain effortlessly smooth, responsive, and real-time for customers as the platform continues to scale to accommodate new user growth.Security - Security is the most important feature. The Backend Development team is responsible for building all the services and core processes with the highest security principles and standard, in order to protect the safety of the entire user base.Exceptional Node/JavaScript skills Familiar with microservices architecture Have actively participated in the development of a complex platform Familiar with Peer-to-Peer technologies Good experience in interacting with databases (MySQL, MongoDB) Ability to quickly learn new technologies Good understanding of security practices Nice to have  Experience with blockchain integration Comfortable with high-availability concepts Ruby, Rust or C++ skills are a plus Other technologies of interest: Message queues (Redis), Caches and Job Queues

118.job_description: Hồ Chí Minh  Full-timeWe are looking for an Associate Applied Science Manager to build LLM-based applications. What you will doLead the development of AI application solutions based on LLM models such as "Search/ Assistant", "Content Creation", "Customer Support",…; Collaborating with other teams such as LLM Foundation, Product, Engineer, QC,..to develop solutions that meet users’ need; Conduct experiments with different LLM models, architectures, fine-tuning techniques, and integration methods to achieve the best results; Stay up-to-date on recent LLM models & architectures.What you will need5+ years of Experience with designing, building, and deploying AI solutions/ applications; Strong understanding of natural language processing (NLP) techniques and deep learning (DL) architectures; Highly motivated individuals with excellent problem-solving, analytical, and critical-thinking skills; Effective communication with pro-active working style; Experience with building AI Products/ Solutions for end-users is a plus; Ph.D is a plus.

119.job_description: Salary: Negotiable Department: Engineering & Technology Company: YouNet Media Application deadline: 04/09 — 31/10/2024  Job description YouNet Media is a member of YouNet Group - the Leading Digital Transformation Group for Marketing powered by Social Intelligence. YouNet Media is the perfect blend of proven TECHNOLOGY expertise & MARKETING mindsets with SocialHeat - the No.1 Social Listening Platform. In VietNam, our technology platform, research and report services are led by the best experts in Internet, Marketing, Research, Computer Science Technology in Vietnam and executed by experienced talents in the field. We are looking for Senior Backend Engineer (NodeJS/Big data) who will join our team to make great products to market. ROLES & RESPONSIBILITIES: Design and develop a platform which collects billions of data from social channels every month Participate to all phases in product development process including analyzing user requirements, designing system architecture, coding, testing and deployment Work with BA and Technical Lead for Social Listening product development Coach junior developers in technology and quality control Report to: Technical Manager Benefit: Basic salary, 13th salary, performance bonus Promotion: Can be promoted to Principal Engineer, Technical Architect (Technical roadmap) Can be promoted to Project Manager, Product Manager (Management roadmap) BENEFITS: 13th month salary, annual bonus. Premium healthcare insurance 12 days of annual leave & 5 days of sick leave Performance appraisals and promotion every year Standard health check Company trip, Year end party, Team building & Happy hours,... Occasion-based offerings: Birthday, wedding, maternity,… Parking support Equipment for work (PC / laptop) REQUIREMENTS: 4+ years experience working with backend services, 2+ years of experience developing in NodeJS and relevant frameworks. Experience with crawling a big amount of data from multiple sources like Facebook, Youtube, Instagram, online news articles. Strong OOP and coding principles, good knowledge about design patterns and architectural patterns Excellent experience in designing and implementing database systems with integrity, scalability, performance, reliability, security in mind. Experience with full-text search engines, such as Solr or ElasticSearch is a plus. Experience using message queues such as RabbitMQ, Kafka. Experience with using Redis. Strong experiences working with MySQL / NonSQL. Good knowledge of the Linux environment. OTHER REQUIREMENTS: Applicants must hold a university degree in computer science, information and communications technology or software engineering with an excellent, very good or good rank. Applicants must be good in English, specifically in writing and reading skills. Previous experience with project management and/or supervisor-type jobs (team leaders, technical assistants, etc.) is an advantage. Previous experience in development tools such as Jira, Wiki, etc. is an advantage. Development method: Scrum, Agile

120.job_description: Do you love sharing unique stories through design and web development?Are you passionate about improving the user experience?Do you enjoy working with a dynamic team to develop a unique and compelling product?At Paradox, we believe when you get the people's things right you can build teams that can change the world. We’re a high performance culture with laser focus on building world class products and a team that our clients love. Our flagship product, Olivia, is the AI assistant helping companies around the world reimagine the way they hire: conversations instead of job applications, automated interview scheduling, and so much more. We’re looking for top performers who have a track record of success and want to build a company together as we continue our triple-digit growth and expand our global footprint.We are looking for a talented Front-end Web Developer who shares our excitement for helping organizations recruit and hire through our best-in-class websites, built from scratch to showcase their unique career opportunities and share their stories. This is an exciting opportunity to roll up your sleeves and bring your web design, CSS/HTML, and Javascript skills to a large number of web-based design-build for a range of diverse clients and projects.You will be an integral member of the Product and Engineering team at Paradox, working collaboratively with product managers, engineers, and client-facing teams to build and ship bespoke websites for our clients.Sound like your perfect fit? We want to hear from you!As a Front-end Web Developer, you will:  Evaluate, develop, and deliver based on design mocks and wireframes per clients’ needs and goals. Partner with our client success and design teams to bring to life the unique story and ethos of each client. Use your CSS/HTML expertise to execute design plans and build websites. Assist in the creation of new frameworks and components using HTML, CSS & JavaScript. Perform required maintenance, updates, and debugging of existing sites as directed by the design and product team. Approach each build with a balance of speed, attention to detail, and flexibility to the changing needs of the project and their team. Participate in the design, development, and support of technical projects from design to completion according to project standards and competing priorities. Job requirements:  2 years of experience of hands-on front-end development building websites using Javascript, HTML, CSS, etc. Experience with VueJS or Nuxt JS is an advantage. Good command of English. Functional experience with storing, tracking, collaborating, and version control of code via GitHub. Experience implementing responsive web design principles to ensure that client websites render well across multiple devices. Experience with taking designs via Sketch, Adobe XD, or Figma (preferred) and independently building sites to specifications. Excellent problem-solving skills with working through complex issues. Able to build reusable codes for future use and share among front-end websites. Possess an open mindset, embracing new ideas, perspectives, and approaches. Be comfortable working in a fast-paced environment, and managing various deadlines. Portfolio or samples of previous website development work. Why You Should Work at Paradox: - Work side by side with a global team of passionate and purposeful people - Talent is our DNA and we pride ourselves on having the best!  Develop amazing products to serve clients who are leading corporations around the world. Ability to make a big impact on a growing organization and drive your own career. The opportunity to build the next big thing in recruiting technology. Professional development opportunities. Benefits package includes:Competitive performance-based salary, annual performance bonus, and 13th-month salary bonus; Annual salary review; Healthcare package with annual health check-ups and premium medical insurance; Free lunch; Petrol allowance; House allowance; In-house English class; Family Care package with medical insurance and child care allowance; Loyalty bonus plan; And heaps of internal events and team buildings to enjoy. To learn more about how we're disrupting the recruiting industry, check out our website: paradox.ai  To know more about our social life, visit our fan page: www.fb.com/ParadoxVietnam  Contact our HR team: jobs.vn@paradox.ai | Skype: live:hr_17855 | Phone: (+84) 236 3788099

121.job_description: Our company We're Hitachi Digital Services, a global digital solutions and transformation business with a bold vision of our world's potential. We're people-centric and here to power good. Every day, we future-proof urban spaces, conserve natural resources, protect rainforests, and save lives. This is a world where innovation, technology, and deep expertise come together to take our company and customers from what's now to what's next. We make it happen through the power of acceleration. Imagine the sheer breadth of talent it takes to bring a better tomorrow closer to today. We don't expect you to 'fit' every requirement – your life experience, character, perspective, and passion for achieving great things in the world are equally as important to us. Meet our Team Hitachi Digital Services Vietnam is part of a 300-strong global delivery network, supporting Hitachi Digital Services around the globe. Our employees collaborate with teams in India, Portugal, and the US, servicing customers worldwide and working on a huge variety of projects. From cloud migration to digital modernization and advanced analytics, offering operational excellence, agile delivery, and plenty of energy to work on huge transformation projects for our customers.  The role  Design and implement solutions, lead team for implementation. Conduct research and stay up-to-date on the latest technologies Collaborate with a team of engineers, communicate effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders Lead team to solve technical problems and provide solutions. Good communication and problem-solving skills. Teamwork, proactive, high responsibility, punctual and detailed in every tasks. Requirement Analysis, Architectural Design, Detailed Design, Implementation, Unit Test. Writing well-designed, testable, and efficient code. Troubleshooting and debugging to optimize performance, providing code documentation and other. Inputs to technical documents and participating in code reviews. Be able to make documents (design doc, report, etc.)  What you'll bring  Bachelor/Master's degree in Computer Science/Engineering, Information Technology or related technical discipline with at least 5 years relevant experiences Experience in the full software development lifecycle from requirements analysis to design, development, testing and implementation Experience in Java, Spring Boot, JSP/Angular, PostgreSQL Good at English and teamwork Must be a dynamic, autonomous, and team-oriented individual. Good communication and working with customer  About us We're a global, team of innovators. Together, we harness engineering excellence and passion to co-create meaningful solutions to complex challenges. We turn organizations into data-driven leaders that can make a positive impact on their industries and society. If you believe that innovation can bring a better tomorrow closer to today, this is the place for you. #LI-NL1Championing diversity, equity, and inclusion  Diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) are integral to our culture and identity. Diverse thinking, a commitment to allyship, and a culture of empowerment help us achieve powerful results. We want you to be you, with all the ideas, lived experience, and fresh perspective that brings. We support your uniqueness and encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our team.  How we look after you We help take care of your today and tomorrow with industry-leading benefits, support, and services that look after your holistic health and wellbeing. We're also champions of life balance and offer flexible arrangements that work for you (role and location dependent). We're always looking for new ways of working that bring out our best, which leads to unexpected ideas. So here, you'll experience a sense of belonging, and discover autonomy, freedom, and ownership as you work alongside talented people you enjoy sharing knowledge with.  We're proud to say we're an equal opportunity employer and welcome all applicants for employment without attention to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran, age, disability status or any other protected characteristic. Should you need reasonable accommodations during the recruitment process, please let us know so that we can do our best to set you up for success.

122.job: Trưởng phòng IT, Quản lý kho dữ liệu
122.job_description: Ngày đăng tuyển: 13/09/2024 Nơi làm việc: Tp. Hồ Chí Minh  MÔ TẢ CHUNG Quản lý IT - Kho dữ liệu sẽ dẫn dắt các sáng kiến dựa trên dữ liệu bằng cách lãnh đạo và phát triển một đội ngũ hiệu suất cao trong việc xây dựng và triển khai các giải pháp phân tích dữ liệu, đảm bảo chất lượng và bảo mật dữ liệu, và giám sát sự phát triển và triển khai các giải pháp phân tích tiên tiến để thúc đẩy các thông tin và quyết định kinh doanh. TRÁCH NHIỆM CHÍNH Chiến Lược & Cấu Trúc Dữ Liệu:  Định nghĩa và triển khai chiến lược dữ liệu vững chắc phù hợp với mục tiêu kinh doanh, bao gồm thu thập dữ liệu, lưu trữ, tích hợp và quản trị dữ liệu.  Kho Dữ Liệu & Lakehouse:  Giám sát thiết kế, phát triển và bảo trì các giải pháp kho dữ liệu và lakehouse trên AWS hoặc Google Cloud, đảm bảo khả năng mở rộng, hiệu suất và toàn vẹn dữ liệu.  Mô Hình Dữ Liệu & Quản Trị:  Xây dựng và thực thi các tiêu chuẩn mô hình dữ liệu, thực tiễn tốt nhất và khung quản trị để đảm bảo chất lượng, tính nhất quán và tuân thủ dữ liệu.  Phân Tích & Thông Tin Tiên Tiến:  Dẫn dắt việc phát triển và triển khai các mô hình phân tích tiên tiến, bao gồm khai thác dữ liệu, phân tích Big Data và học máy, để tìm ra các thông tin hữu ích và tạo ra giá trị cho doanh nghiệp.  Hợp Tác Với Các Bên Liên Quan:  Hợp tác với các bên liên quan để hiểu nhu cầu dữ liệu của họ và chuyển đổi thành các dự án và giải pháp khoa học dữ liệu có thể hành động. Truyền đạt các kết quả kỹ thuật phức tạp một cách rõ ràng và súc tích đến cả đối tượng kỹ thuật và không kỹ thuật.  Công Nghệ & Đổi Mới:  Liên tục đánh giá và áp dụng các công nghệ tiên tiến trong các lĩnh vực khoa học dữ liệu và điện toán đám mây để duy trì lợi thế cạnh tranh.  Dự Án Chuyển Đổi Số:  Dẫn dắt việc triển khai các giải pháp dữ liệu đổi mới nhằm cho phép các mô hình kinh doanh mới, cải thiện trải nghiệm khách hàng và nâng cao hiệu quả hoạt động. Xác định các chỉ số hiệu suất chính (KPI) và phát triển bảng điều khiển để theo dõi và đo lường tác động của các nỗ lực chuyển đổi số. Cung cấp thông tin và khuyến nghị để hướng dẫn quyết định chiến lược và tối ưu hóa quy trình kinh doanh.  Quản Lý Thay Đổi:  Phát triển và quản lý quy trình thay đổi tập trung cho các sáng kiến dữ liệu. Đảm bảo tất cả các thay đổi được kiểm tra, tài liệu hóa và thông báo cho các bên liên quan. Theo dõi và kiểm soát các yêu cầu thay đổi để giảm thiểu sự gián đoạn cấu trúc dữ liệu và đảm bảo việc triển khai thành công.  Kiểm Soát Thay Đổi:  Thiết lập các quy trình kiểm soát thay đổi để quản lý các thay đổi dữ liệu hiệu quả. Đảm bảo các thay đổi phù hợp với mục tiêu kinh doanh và không làm giảm sự bảo mật hoặc tuân thủ. Duy trì nhật ký kiểm soát thay đổi và đảm bảo tài liệu đúng cách cho tất cả các thay đổi. Thực hiện các đánh giá sau triển khai để đánh giá sự thành công của các thay đổi và xác định các lĩnh vực cần cải thiện.  Mô Hình Dữ Liệu & Quản Trị:  Xây dựng và thực thi các tiêu chuẩn mô hình dữ liệu, thực tiễn tốt nhất và khung quản trị để đảm bảo chất lượng, tính nhất quán và tuân thủ dữ liệu trong suốt hành trình chuyển đổi số. Thúc đẩy quyết định dựa trên dữ liệu và phát triển văn hóa hiểu biết dữ liệu trong tổ chức. Làm việc chặt chẽ với các nhà lãnh đạo kinh doanh và các nhóm chức năng để hiểu các mục tiêu chuyển đổi số của họ và chuyển đổi thành các dự án khoa học dữ liệu có thể hành động.  Đào Tạo và Hỗ Trợ Người Dùng:  Đào tạo end-user về cách sử dụng bảng Dashboard và giải thích dữ liệu được trình bày. Cung cấp hỗ trợ liên tục và cải tiến Dashboard dựa trên phản hồi của người dùng. Phát triển tài liệu và tài liệu đào tạo cho người dùng Dashboard.  Quản Lý Đội Ngũ:  Lãnh đạo, hướng dẫn và phát triển một đội ngũ quản trị CNTT và PMO hiệu suất cao. Đặt mục tiêu hiệu suất và thực hiện các đánh giá hiệu suất định kỳ. Khuyến khích văn hóa đội ngũ hợp tác và đổi mới trong tất cả các chức năng CNTT. Cung cấp huấn luyện và hỗ trợ cho các thành viên trong đội để giúp họ đạt được các mục tiêu nghề nghiệp của mình.  Lãnh Đạo & Phát Triển Đội Ngũ:  Khuyến khích một văn hóa đội ngũ hợp tác và hiệu suất cao. Cung cấp sự hướng dẫn, hỗ trợ và cơ hội phát triển nghề nghiệp cho các nhà khoa học dữ liệu và nhà phân tích. Khuyến khích văn hóa tuân thủ, quản trị và trách nhiệm trong đội ngũ. Xác định nhu cầu đào tạo và cung cấp cơ hội phát triển kỹ năng cho tất cả các thành viên trong đội ngũ Dữ liệu và người dùng hệ thống. Cập nhật các xu hướng và thực tiễn tốt nhất của ngành để đảm bảo đội ngũ luôn cạnh tranh và có kiến thức.YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC  Bằng Thạc sĩ về Khoa học Máy tính, Khoa học Dữ liệu, Thống kê, Toán học hoặc lĩnh vực liên quan. Bằng Cử nhân với kinh nghiệm liên quan đáng kể cũng sẽ được xem xét. Trên 5 năm kinh nghiệm thực tiễn trong lĩnh vực khoa học dữ liệu, với ít nhất 3 năm ở vai trò lãnh đạo hoặc quản lý. Có thành tích chứng minh trong việc quản lý các dự án và đội ngũ khoa học dữ liệu, đặc biệt là trong các sáng kiến chuyển đổi số. Kỹ năng Kỹ Thuật: Kiến thức chuyên sâu về Python, R hoặc SQL. Chuyên môn về kho dữ liệu, kiến trúc lakehouse dữ liệu và mô hình dữ liệu. Kinh nghiệm thực tế với công nghệ dữ liệu lớn (Hadoop, Spark), nền tảng đám mây (AWS, GCP) và các khung học máy. Lãnh Đạo & Giao Tiếp: Kỹ năng lãnh đạo, giao tiếp và quan hệ cá nhân mạnh mẽ. Khả năng xây dựng môi trường hợp tác và truyền cảm hứng cho một đội ngũ chuyên gia dữ liệu. Kỹ Năng Phân Tích & Giải Quyết Vấn Đề: Khả năng phân tích và giải quyết vấn đề xuất sắc. Thành tích chứng minh trong việc sử dụng dữ liệu để tạo ra các giải pháp và thông tin kinh doanh. Hiểu Biết Về Quản Trị Dữ Liệu, An Ninh Dữ Liệu, và Các Công Nghệ Mới Nổi. Hiểu Biết Về Quy Định Bảo Mật Dữ Liệu và Tiêu Chuẩn Quản Lý Rủi Ro Kinh Doanh. Khả Năng Làm Việc Dưới Áp Lực và Quản Lý Nhiều Ưu Tiên. Chú Ý Tới Chi Tiết và Kỹ Năng Tổ Chức. Khả Năng Ảnh Hưởng và Xây Dựng Mối Quan Hệ Mạnh Mẽ Với Các Bên Liên Quan Ở Tất Cả Các Cấp Độ. Kiến Thức Về Masterdata, Tập Dữ Liệu, Quản Trị Dữ Liệu, Khai Thác Dữ Liệu Lớn và AI. Tư duy chiến lược: Khả năng căn chỉnh các sáng kiến khoa học dữ liệu với các mục tiêu và mục đích chuyển đổi số tổng thể. Khả năng thích ứng: Thoải mái làm việc trong môi trường nhanh nhẹn, năng động với các ưu tiên thay đổi. Đam mê dữ liệu & đổi mới: Sự nhiệt tình thực sự đối với dữ liệu và tiềm năng của nó trong việc chuyển đổi doanh nghiệp thông qua công nghệ số. Hoạch định chiến lược và tổ chức. Tính chủ động. Xây dựng mối quan hệ. Tính lạc quan và tư duy cởi mở. Sẵn sàng chia sẻ và cố vấn. Tư duy thiết kế/đổi mới. Liêm chính, chuyên nghiệp và tinh thần sở hữu (giá trị cốt lõi).

123.job_description: Chi Doanh - CB/I Digital is seeking for an experienced Content Creator who will be responsible for producing high-quality content in both English and Vietnamese and utilizing their exceptional writing skills and creativity. JOB DESCRIPTIONCreate SEO-optimized content in English and Vietnamese across various formats, including:Blog posts, Articles, Product descriptions, Landing pages, Category pages Conduct keyword research Create content at scale, managing a high volume of assignments Optimize content structure, headings, meta descriptions, and tags that meet SEO standards Monitor and analyze content performance using tools like Google Analytics and Search Console to identify improvement opportunities Stay up-to-date with the latest SEO trends, algorithms, and best practices to ensure content remains competitive Collaborate with the SEO and marketing teams to develop and implement content strategies aligned with project goals.BENEFITSA competitive salary depending on your level of expertise A dynamic, transparent, and professional work environment Social insurance, health insurance and other benefits in accordance with the Labor Law and the Company policies PLUS PTI premium insurance An annual company trip A possibility for an early salary raise with solid contribution A 13th month salary and a bonus based on the performance Overtime pay according to company policy (x1.5 for weekdays, x2 for weekends) Flexible work hours. Collaborative work environment with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation Access to industry-leading SEO tools and resources Opportunities for professional development by joining big enterprise project in both Vietnam and US Mentorship from experienced content creators and SEO experts Exposure to a wide range of industries and topics to enhance your writing versatility.REQUIREMENTRequired Qualifications  Native-level proficiency in Vietnamese and professional working proficiency in English Experience with keyword research and content optimization techniques Familiarity with any SEO tools (such as Google Analytics, Search Console, or Ahrefs) Good at writing, editing, and proofreading skills Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to present complex information clearly and persuasively. Preferred Qualifications  Proven experience in creating SEO-focused content that drives organic traffic. Experience using AI tools like ChatGPT, Gemini, or Claude to streamline content creation and optimization processes is a big plus Familiarity with WordPress or other content management systems Understanding of internal link building and SEO tactics Good at time management and organizational skills Knowledge of HTML and basic web publishing. Những câu hỏi thường gặp Kỹ năng và chuyên môn cần có ở một chuyên gia SEO Content?Để trở thành một chuyên gia SEO Content, bạn cần phát triển một loạt kỹ năng và kiến thức chuyên môn quan trọng:  1. Hiểu biết về seo:  Nắm vững các nguyên tắc cơ bản của seo, bao gồm tối ưu hóa trang web (on-page seo), xây dựng liên kết (off-page seo), và tối ưu hóa kỹ thuật. 2. Nghiên cứu từ khóa:  Học cách sử dụng công cụ nghiên cứu từ khóa để tìm ra những từ khóa phù hợp với mục tiêu của doanh nghiệp và khách hàng mục tiêu. 3. Viết lách chất lượng:  Phát triển kỹ năng viết lách để tạo ra nội dung hấp dẫn, thông tin và tối ưu cho seo. 4. Phân tích đối thủ:  Nghiên cứu và phân tích chiến lược nội dung của đối thủ cạnh tranh để hiểu được những gì họ đang làm và làm thế nào bạn có thể làm tốt hơn. 5. Hiểu biết về content marketing:  Nắm vững cách thức tiếp thị nội dung và cách nó tích hợp với các chiến lược seo tổng thể. 6. Sử dụng công cụ seo:  Trở nên thành thạo với các công cụ seo như google analytics, semrush, ahrefs, hoặc moz để theo dõi hiệu suất và cải thiện chiến lược nội dung của bạn. 7. Cập nhật xu hướng mới:  Luôn cập nhật với các xu hướng mới trong seo và marketing nội dung để nội dung của bạn không lỗi thời. 8. Thực hành liên tục:  Seo là một lĩnh vực thay đổi nhanh chóng, vì vậy việc thực hành liên tục và thử nghiệm mới là cách tốt nhất để học hỏi và cải thiện.

124.job_description: We help the world run better  At SAP, we enable you to bring out your best. Our company culture is focused on collaboration and a shared passion to help the world run better. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from.  About SAP Labs Network and SAP Labs Vietnam  SAP Labs Network is the global R&D setup where over 55,000 engineers around the world create, operate and support the most innovative enterprise solutions for SAP’s customers worldwide. SAP Labs Vietnam aims to become one of the key locations within the SAP Labs Network to support the engineering growth for SAP.Meet your team We, the CPIT Client Service team is to deliver best in class employee workplace and collaboration experience, enriched by world-class support services, AI and cloud solutions to boost SAP employee's productivity.What you'll do  Manage and Maintain Labs Vietnam IT infrastructure Provide on-site IT support to SAP employees Provide technical support to development project Provide support for local events Set up new offices or manage office relocations as required Participate in global/regional IT projects Contributing to the rollout and implementation of new technologies and services. Deliver exceptional customer service and build strong relationships with colleagues. What you bring  3+ years of IT support experience Experience in office setup or relocation Qualification in IT, Computer Science, or related field Strong understanding of Windows and macOS  • In-depth knowledge of PC hardware (laptops, desktops) • Familiar with Microsoft Office 365, SharePoint, OneDrive, Teams, etc.  Basic IT security knowledge (data leakage, phishing, vulnerabilities, patching)  • Basic networking knowledge (TCP/IP, cabling, LAN, Wireless, WAN, VPN) • ITIL Foundation certification preferred • Exceptional customer focus and communication • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills  Systematic, communicative, creative approach Strong teamwork spirit Fluency in spoken and written English  #SAPLabsVietnamCareers  Bring out your best SAP innovations help more than four hundred thousand customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with two hundred million users and more than one hundred thousand employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, you can bring out your best.  We win with inclusion SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world. SAP is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provide accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.  EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability: Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, age, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability. Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor. Requisition ID: 404022 | Work Area: Information Technology | Expected Travel: 0 - 10% | Career Status: Professional | Employment Type: Regular Full Time | Additional Locations: #LI-Hybrid.

125.job_description: Job Description  – Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement robust backend services.– Employ modern Java technologies to improve system performance, security, and scalability.– Maintain a clean codebase with adherence to industry best practices for upgradability and maintenance.– Contribute to code reviews and apply debugging skills to ensure system reliability.– Promote a team culture that values diversity, equity, inclusion, and respect.  Requirements  Minimum:  – Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field.– Minimum 3 years of experience with Java 8 or newer.  Experience:  – Mastery of Java core, OOP, data structures, and algorithms.– Proficiency with Spring Framework (Spring, Spring Boot, Spring Security, Spring JPA, etc.).– Solid experience with SQL databases.– Knowledge of testing methodologies and frameworks.– Hands-on experience with AWS, Docker, Kubernetes (K8S).– Versed in version control (Git, SVN).– Familiarity with build and project management tools: Maven, Gradle, Jira, Confluence, etc.– Excellent problem-solving skills and a passion for learning new technologies.– Empathy, integrity, commitment, and respect in all interactions.– Intermediate or higher level of English proficiency, especially for technical documentation and international communication.– Understanding of microservices architecture.  Benefits – Attractive salary package, up to 3000$– Salary review twice a year– Flexible working hour– Premium health care up to $3,000/year– Working in One of the largest Ecommerce Agencies in South East Asia – Professional English environment– Free English, Japanese and professional training packages– Firm’s Certified Qualifications Sponsorship for career development– Annual company trip inside or outside Vietnam– Other fun activities: happy hour, quarterly team building, football club, yoga club, swimming club, charity activities, etc.– Free entertainment parties: Birthday party, Anniversary party, Sum-up Party, Year-End Party, etc.

126.job_description: Our Journey  ShopBack was born one night in 2014 when co-founders Henry and Joel were toying around (with entrepreneurial ideas) in Henry's car, sparking the concept of earning Cashback while shopping online. The ShopBack Group has now grown to become the leading shopping, rewards, and payments platform in Asia-Pacific, with 45 million shoppers across 12 markets and more than half a million transactions powered for 20,000 partners daily. Fresh off its debut in the European market, ShopBack is seeking thrill-seekers to join the journey of building The World's Most Rewarding Way to Shop. Get ready for the ride of a lifetime: a blend of startup spirit woven into a solid business foundation.About the role  As the Localisation Project Coordinator on the Product Design team, you’ll play a crucial role in ensuring the content in our products is appropriately adapted for diverse international audiences through localisation, enhancing our global reach and impact.You’ll be responsible for managing localisation projects across multiple teams, guaranteeing timely execution and maintaining high-quality standards. You’ll not only support our market expansion initiatives but also serve clear and delightful localised content to our existing markets. You’ll also be in charge of resolving any linguistic bugs raised by the local teams or our users.To be successful in this role, you’ll need a strong background and knowledge in project management, a basic understanding of the product localisation processes, and exceptional cross-functional communication skills. Most importantly, you must have a passion for localisation and clearly understand its value.Your Adventure AheadProject management: Support the Localisation Manager to manage all aspects of localisation projects, from resource allocation, check/send/receive projects, to timeline management. Coordinate with Design, Product, Engineering and Legal stakeholders to ensure timely and accurate delivery of localised content from the external vendor.  Quality assurance: Enforce quality standards for localised content, ensuring accuracy, consistency, and cultural relevance across all languages with the Localisation Manager. Collaborate with subject matter experts from the local on-site teams to validate localised content from vendors.  Technology adoption: Leverage tools and technologies, such as computer-assisted translation tools and AI, to further streamline processes, increase efficiency, and achieve cost sustainability. Stay updated on industry trends and recommend innovative solutions to improve workflows.  Reporting and analytics: Collect data and prepare reports on localisation performance, project statuses and costs to enable decisions on process and expenditure optimisation.  Advocacy and representation: You and the Localisation Manager work as a team to advocate for internationalisation and localisation in all aspects of our business and to show that they’re essential to extending our reach and improving the customer experience.Essentials to Succeed  3+ years experience working in translation, localisation and/or project coordinating-related roles. Experience managing content, translation or other service vendors. A clear understanding of localisation processes, quality assurance practice and the e-commerce, reward and/or fintech industries. Demonstrated ability to work in diverse cross-functional product teams developing website and mobile app products. Experience using computer-assisted translation tools (CAT) and translation management systems (TMS). Have basic knowledge of using AI supporting localisation. Strong work ethic and effective collaborative teamwork. Advanced proficiency in English, with additional language skills considered a plus. Project management certification is a plus. ShopBackers' DNA Grit - We tackle all challenges head-on, working together to solve problems and achieve success.  Hunger - We value hard work, and having relentless drive.  Speed - We move fast and have a bias for action, all to deliver maximum impact.  Impact - We focus on results, always aiming for the best possible outcomes and timelines.  Growth - We embrace a growth mindset, constantly striving to learn, improve, and excel in our roles.Exclusively for ShopBackers Career progression paths and opportunities to take on greater challenges that help you realise your ambitions.  Be part of a winning team on a journey to global scale.  Competitive compensation based on your performance.  Candid, open, and collaborative culture where feedback is valued, for everyone to grow and improve every day.  Flow Day Thursday (1-day a week, optional to work from home or office)

127.job_description: Giới thiệu: Chi tiết công việc Participate in software development process. Maintain, modify products after releasing. Research new technologies to develop products to meet the company's business strategy. Yêu cầu ứng viên At least one-year experience of software development. Good English communication (must-have), having English certifications is an advantage. Firm grasp of computer science (OOP programming, Data Structures Algorithm). Proficiency in Java Spring boot/Hibernate. Knowledge of distributed systems and asynchronous architectures. Experience with AngularJS is an advantage. Keen problem-solving and trouble-shooting abilities. Quyền lợi  Professional and Innovative Work Environment: Energetic colleagues who value knowledge-sharing. Strong learning culture with a desire for knowledge accumulation. Personal development support: Mentorship in career development. Free English and Japanese classes. Sponspored training programs: AWS, ISTQB, etc. Employee-Centric Benefits: Project bonuses, 13th-month salary (average 14-15 months salary/year) and holiday bonuses. Quarterly performance reviews. Paid leave from the probation period, with the option to receive the salary if not used. Health check once a year and advanced healthcare program. Women's care policy: Late arrivals/early departures three times a month, maternity leave with a bonus equivalent to one month's salary. Drinks and snacks provided at the office. Support for educational activities, knowledge sharing, and cultural exchanges (Rabitalk, sport clubs: football, table tennis, badminton, etc). Annual trips and quarterly team-building activities. Benefit policy for employee's family. Recruitment process: Resume screening = >Online test = >Interview = >Offer. Địa điểm làm việc: TPHCM Lương: 12000K - 16000K VND một tháng Loại hình công việc: Thỏa thuận thời gian  Yêu cầu: Quyền lợi: Bảo Hiểm Y Tế, Chăm Sóc Sức Khỏe, Cơ Hội Phát Triển Hạn nộp: 2024-11-14 Kinh nghiệm: 1 - 2 năm Bằng cấp: Đại học Lĩnh vực: IT/CNTT -IT Phần mềm Số lượng cần tuyển: 1 Giới tính: Không yêu cầu

128.job_description: Job description  ABOUT THE JOB  Work as part of a multi-shore engineering team, collaborating closely with the squad lead and product owner to deliver features incrementally within the SCRUM methodology. Choose the right technologies, design patterns for our use cases. Design API specifications and implementation. Develop, Test, Deploy microservice on K8s. Secure the data at rest. Use container technologies. Develop a new platform (greenfield project) from scratch on cloud native stack.  ABOUT YOU  Bachelor’s degree or college’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field, or equivalent IT qualifications. 5+ years of experience in Java server-side development with a good understanding of core design patterns. Knowledge of Development lifecycle, Microservice, REST, APIs, Deployment tools, Design Patterns, Object-Oriented Programming, Database: SQLl/NoSQL. Programming language: JAVA, JavaScript. Knowledge of BFF, GraphQL is plus. Experience of Unix/Linux environment. Experience of Agile/Scrum development methodologies is a plus. Cloud knowledge a big plus (AWS/GCP) – (Kubernetes/Docker). Exposure to Microservices and AWS.  Benefits  13th-month salary 14+ annual leaves per year Premium healthcare insurance, starting from your probation period Project reviews and yearly performance appraisals Annual company trips Teambuilding activities: Team lunch/dinner, events, and celebrations, sports clubs (football, yoga, badminton, etc.) International team with flexible working time + hybrid working Tailor-made career path Technical workshops and training courses Mobility: Opportunities to be on-site abroad in our offices in over 60+ countries  Equal Opportunity  Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal-opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.  Who are we? Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7500 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.  At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like:  Brief Call: Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!  Interviews (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!  Case study: Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.  As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience. We look forward to meeting you!

129.job_description: Khối / Ban Khối Dịch vụ Công nghệ Ngân hàngLĩnh vực Công nghệ thông tinĐịa điểm Hồ Chí MinhLoại hình công việc Fulltime (toàn thời gian)Thời hạn ứng tuyển 30/10/2024Số lượng cần tuyển 1Mô tả công việc Mục tiêu: Responsible for overseeing and managing an organization‘s data governance framework to ensure data quality, security, and compliance with regulations. This role leads a data governance team experts and involves developing and implementing policies, processes, and procedures related to data management as well as regulatory and VIB standards, collaborating with various departments, and leading a team of data governance professionals Trách nhiệm: Develop and implement a comprehensive data governance strategy aligned with the organization’s objectives; Establish and enforce data governance policies, standards, and procedures. Develop and oversee data privacy and security policies and procedures; Develop and implement data quality metrics and monitoring processes ensure the accuracy, completeness, and reliability of data across the organization; Establish a robust data ownership, data domain, data catalog and metadata management system, etc…; Perform regular monitoring activities to identify and resolve data quality issues (e.g., duplicates, inconsistencies, missing values) across multiple systems and databases; Provide training, coaching, and support to colleagues on data governance best practices, tools, and techniques; Perform other tasks as assigned by management. Yêu cầu: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Data Management, Information Systems, Computer Science, or a related field; Experience: 5+ years of experience in data management/ data governance or similar role within the life insurance industry or other relevant financial services sector. 3+ years in a senior management position; Technical skills: strong proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, SQL, and/or SAS for data manipulation, analysis, and visualization; Strong analytical thinking and problem-solving abilities to identify root causes of data quality issues and develop effective solutions; Familiarity with data management tools such as Data360, Informatica, Databrick Unity Catalog, Azure Data Factory, or other relevant software packages; Demonstrated ability to work independently, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and adapt quickly to changing priorities in a fast-paced environment; Communication and interpersonal skills: Excellent communication and presentation skills, along with the ability to effectively interact with stakeholders at all levels within the organization; Compliance and data security: Deep understanding of regulations related to data security and privacy, as well as experience in implementing data security measures; Leadership and management skills: Ability to lead teams, develop talent, and manage complex projects.

130.job_description: This is a career-defining opportunity to be a member of a tech startup that is implementing an end-to-end solution that will power the future of data science and data engineering. As our Senior Product Designer, you will build intuitive user-driven experiences for the company ’s SaaS products. You will leverage user testing, UX, UI, and product design best practices to create a world-class user experience for data scientists and AI engineers. Your Impact  Design and define the design system for the comapny's core products. Translate complex and abstract concepts into usable and intuitive human-first products to power the future of AI engineering Execute the necessary assignments of each stage of the design-thinking process to inform the UX and UI decisions Fuel design ideas and stories through a holistic view of the objectives of the different teams and market research Empower humidity through your product design Collaborate with product managers, developers, and data scientists to define and execute workflows. RequirementsFundamental knowledge of digital product design, including color, typography, layout, component management, accessibility. Ability to iterate and ship products quickly in fast pacing startup environments. Experience with building software products Ability to manage and take complete ownership of projects, while gathering valuable input from team members and customers. Excellent written, verbal, and visual communication skills, and the ability to eloquently defend design ideas in executive and peer-review meetings. Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail Proficiency in Figma and experience with Illustrator/Photoshop or equivalent tools. Ability to prototype quickly to communicate your ideas using Figma Prototype,Principle, AfterEffects, or any tool of your choice. Work from anywhere in the world but expect to overlap at least a few hours a day with Pacific Standard Time. Fundamental knowledge of HTML/CSS/Tailwind is a plus Familiarity with SaaS business models is a plus

131.job_description: Medical Lead - ONCO - HCMAbout AstraZeneca and AstraZeneca Vietnam  AstraZeneca AstraZeneca (LSE/STO/Nasdaq: AZN) is a global, science-led biopharmaceutical company that focuses on the discovery, development, and commercialization of prescription medicines in Oncology, Rare Diseases and BioPharmaceuticals, including Cardiovascular, Renal & Metabolism, and Respiratory & Immunology. Based in Cambridge, UK, AstraZeneca operates in over 100 countries and its innovative medicines are used by millions of patients worldwide. Please visit astrazeneca.com and follow the Company on Twitter @AstraZeneca.AstraZeneca Vietnam As a Foreign Invested Enterprise with over 600 members, AstraZeneca is investing into Vietnam 360 million USD from 2020 to 2030 with a focus on reducing the burdens of non-communicable diseases, developing local talent, and uplifting the domestic biopharmaceutical R&D and manufacturing capabilities.  Over the last three decades accompanying Vietnam’s sustainable development, AstraZeneca has run several impactful programmes in collaboration with the Government, Ministry of Health and healthcare partners to promote disease awareness, prevention and early detection. In recent years, AstraZeneca Vietnam has received several certificates of merit from the Prime Minister and Minister of Health, for excellent contributions to Vietnam’s vaccine diplomacy, fight against COVID-19 and advancement of cancer treatment and disease awareness. The company has also been recognized among Vietnam’s Top 100 Best Places to Work (2018 – 2023) with various other industry awards from BritCham, EuroCham, and government agencies.What you’ll do  Job Description / Capsule Office based medical leader who can be a single contributor as well as be responsible for a team within a given Therapy Area or for a significant product to ensure the company business unit goals are achieved. Accountable for strategic Therapy Area direction, establishing standards of medical capability, business/resource planning, scientific leadership within the Medical Affairs Team.  Embeds a deep healthcare system practices and gaps understanding (environment, priorities, clinical and patient pathways, etc) that can translate into actionable strategies within the local Medical Plans. Accountable for developing and execution of the Therapy Area/Product Medical Affairs Plans composed of confidence and evidence generation activities, as well as fundamental and sustainable clinical practice transformations that strengthen healthcare ecosystems, improve treatment outcomes, drive meaningful changes in patient care and treatment paradigms and enable access to quality care in alignment with the company’s portfolio. Recognizes and incorporates innovation wherever appropriate into Medical Affairs strategic plans and lead in execution to drive strategic and sustainable impact internally and externally to support the adoption of evidence-based practices, guidelines, and treatment approaches. Acts as a catalysts of sustainable healthcare ecosystem change, enhancing access to quality care for patients and enabling the adoption of our innovative medicines.  Ensures that all local medical requirements are met for all product/TA material and will use medical expertise to contribute to the marketing direction of the product/TA. Recognised as a medical expert within the local marketing company and be responsible for providing medical leadership, expertise, and strategic input to ensure that the Medical Affairs plans align with the broader business objectives. As a Medical Leader, collaborate with leaders from relevant cross-functional teams identify, activate and measure scalable healthcare practice shaping initiatives with integrated partnership engagement plans composed of key traditional (e.g. HCPs) and non-traditional (e.g. policy and decision makers, PAGs, government, innovative solution providers) stakeholders. Able to lead a significant cross functional, projects. For example, projects like RWE, pre-launch, post-launch clinical trials or market access projects. Works to ensure operational excellence and collaborates with compliance to ensure adherence to company standards.Typical Accountabilities  Medical strategy and clinical input  Drive Medically led/co-led, based initiatives, on an identified gap in collaboration with CFTs, that contributes to an overarching plan mapped to drive positive patient outcomes. Leverage medical expertise to design, implement, and oversee real-world evidence (RWE) projects. Identifies reliable suitable data sources and ensure the scientific rigor and integrity of real-world studies. Responsible for interpreting and communicating the findings from RWE projects with a strong focus on translating RWE into actionable insights that can internally inform medical and commercial strategies and externally ultimately improve patient outcomes and inform healthcare decision-making. Establish AstraZeneca as a scientific leader through proactive medical inputs. Lead educational initiatives, developing clinical support tools, and providing scientific expertise to support the integration of new medical advancements into clinical practice. Puts in place measures to showcase the impact of initiatives. Agile adoption of innovation through win-win partnerships within the healthcare ecosystem that are scalable and can enable sustainable patient outcomes. Team Leader  Enhances medical effectiveness by building a performance driven team with robust systems and processes with the right capabilities in place to meet current and future needs of the AZ Medical team. Fostering a collaborative and inclusive team environment, where individuals are supported in their professional development and empowered to contribute their expertise to the broader goals of the organization. Responsible for setting clear expectations, goals, and priorities for the team, and ensuring alignment with the overall medical and business strategies. Promotes a culture of scientific excellence, integrity, and continuous learning within the team. Organises and delivers education and training to cross-functional employees to ensure scientific knowledge is kept up to date within the local organization. Will often guide and mentor more junior Medical Affairs colleagues providing ongoing coaching and feedback to team members, as well as support their career growth and skills development. Medical Governance Oversight  Leads a team that ensures all product materials for a specific therapy area are kept up to date and accurate.Personally, provides expert scientific support and approval on product materials involving large or more complex drugs, or documents and reports for more important conferences/symposiums. Has signatory authority on outgoing therapy area materials. Advises the marketing team as a medical healthcare expert ensuring the medical and scientific accuracy of outgoing marketing materials. Ensures that all branding work is carried out in accordance with AstraZeneca standards and external regulation. Governance and overall adherence to processes and regulations including but not limited to: clinical trials, promotional activity (e.g. Local country Code of Ethics), patient safety (ensure that pharmacovigilance activities meet internal SOP and local regulations e.g. RMPs, PI updates, oversight of safety profile of products registered in the local country) Education, Qualifications, Skills, and ExperienceEssential  Science degree and or master’s degree in a scientific discipline Extensive experience of Medical Affairs function within a pharmaceutical industry Strong understanding of medical, clinical development, and regulatory requirements Extensive experience in stakeholder management Strong project management and organizational skills Excellent oral and written communication Extensive team management experience Ability to work effectively in a matrix cross-functional environment. Desirable  Doctoral degree in a scientific discipline (e.g. M.D., Ph.D., Pharm.D.) Extensive knowledge of the latest technical and regulatory developments Innovative and solution-oriented mindset Experience with basic research, drug discovery and development and drug lifecycle management. Ecosystem scaled project experience Key Relationships to reach solutions  Internal (to AZ or team)  Commercial Function (Marketing & Sales) May need Senior local management relationships. Corporate Affairs (GA & Communications) Market Access (Pricing, Patient Programs, etc) Medical Function (RA, PV, MI, NS, etc) Compliance Team HR Function Other local, regional, and global stakeholders External (to AZ)  Healthcare professionals Government (i.e. Regulatory, Reimbursement, Policy) Innovation ecosystem stakeholders (i.e. Research Institutions, Startups, Incubators) Other local and regional stakeholders Why AstraZeneca?Be bold and make a powerful impact: AstraZeneca is a world-leading business where standards are high and challenges complex, but also a collective where we build, support and motivate each other. This unique combination of strong expectation and empowerment invites you to improve how our markets work and make your individual mark. Here, you can follow your ambitions with full confidence. As part of a responsible, value-led business with a strong sustainability agenda, you can also help impact the future beyond business projects.  Be part of our growth journey and success story: Join the fastest growing pharmaceutical company in our markets, set up to fuel further growth. Make the most of our assets: our strong heritage, our early investment and commitment in emerging markets, and how we embrace digital and data to transform the patient journey. Go beyond your limits. Welcome failure as a chance to learn. There’s no better place to feel inspired, energised and try new things.  Learn and grow by embracing diverse opportunities: Experience an organisation where professional development is prized and nurtured. Access the tools and support you need to continuously learn. Then it’s up to each of us to step up, speak up and show what we can do. Take advantage of working in a global business with opportunities to move beyond your role and open international doors. At AstraZeneca, your future is in your own hands.  Urgently bring our leading pipeline to millions of patients in need: Seize the opportunity to help improve the lives of millions of patients, including in areas where patient needs are often unmet. Work with our transformative pipeline to help bring a variety of high-quality medicines to market – and ensure they are made easily accessible to as many patients as possible.  Be heard in a culture of local empowerment: AstraZeneca is set up for creativity. We encourage unity and ownership at a local level, with collaboration across the global organisation. We tailor how we work, adapting to our markets and healthcare systems. In our diverse community, every voice is important. Share your ideas and opinions openly. In our speak-up culture, the way we communicate with each other leads to more powerful innovation.So, what’s next? If you are already inspiring yourself to join our dream team, we can’t wait to hear from you. If you are ready to bring new insights and fresh thinking to the table, Brilliant! We have one seat available, and we hope it’s yours. If you’re curious to know more then please take initiative to recruitment.Vietnam@astrazeneca.com. We encourage your application.Where can I find out more?  Visit our website www.astrazeneca.vn Follow us on LinkedIn www.linkedin.com/company/astrazeneca/ and Facebook https://www.facebook.com/AstraZenecaVN Contact us via recruitment.Vietnam@astrazeneca.com

133.job_description: Mô tả công việc: (Mức lương: 12 - 15 triệu VNĐ)  In the role of IT Technical Support An IT Technician is a professional who is responsible for installing, maintaining and repairing hardware & software components of the organization's computers. Their duties may include repairing or replacing damaged hardware, performing tests on new hardware or software, installing new equipment and logging its resolution. Responsibility Areas  Monitor, configure, troubleshoot LAN/WAN systems and network devices (switches, routers, firewalls...). Deploying and administering Server, Domain Controller, Antivirus systems. Perform virtualization of VMWare and Windows servers. Deploy and manage online meeting system. Deploying and managing the system of switchboards, surveillance cameras, timekeepers, door control. Management of sales software, accounting software and other software of the company. Manage and purchase IT equipment according to user requirements. Ensure data is stored securely and backed up regularly. Ensure smooth connection between servers. Research and propose new methods to improve computer network systems, processes, IT policies. Stay up to date with information and keep abreast of technology trends and developments.  Education and Experience  Proven experience as a System Administrator, Network Administrator or similar role. Experience with databases, networks (LAN, WAN). Knowledge of system security and data backup/recovery. Excellent diagnostic and problem solving skills. Degree in Computer Science, engineering or relevant field. Certification as IT Technician will be an advantage (Cisco, Microsoft Certified IT Professional, VMWare).  Specific Knowledge, Skills and other Competencies (if any)  Good in communication skills. Good in planning and execution. Good in collaboration & team work. Good in presentation skills. 134.job_description: Prudential’s purpose is to be partners for every life and protectors for every future. Our purpose encourages everything we do by creating a culture in which diversity is celebrated and inclusion assured, for our people, customers, and partners. We provide a platform for our people to do their best work and make an impact to the business, and we support our people’s career ambitions. We pledge to make Prudential a place where you can Connect, Grow, and Succeed.  This role will lead a team of data warehouse engineers in designing, building and maintaining our data warehouse. You will also be responsible for working with stakeholders to identify and prioritize data warehousing needs.Accountability(1) Deliver data quality of Data Warehouse team (2) Build & develop capability of data warehouse team (3) Deliver data service which act as a feasible, reliable, transparent data source for advanced analysis & AI/ML models purpose. (4) Contribute & driven in enhance data security & data governance framework. Key Responsibilities(1) Maintain and Enhance Data Quality:  Contribute, follow & enforce data quality standards and guidelines to ensure accurate, reliable, and robust data warehouse services.  (2) Build, Deliver & Monitor Data Services:  Define data warehouse models, build and deliver reliability and efficiency data warehouse services, ensure adherence to quality standard, and optimize for analytics purpose.  (3) Collaborate and Advise:  Monitor team's resource(budget, personnel, hardware, software, ...), communicate & work with IT team, to ensure the stability of infrastructure for data science projects & data warehouse services. Work closely with data science, data analysis, and data delivery team to identify and prioritize data warehousing needs. Communicate quality standards to teams and provide training and support as necessary.  (4) Documentation:  Ensure thorough documentation of data quality standards, procedures, and guidelines.  (5) Continuous Development:  Involve in team's activity & strengthen team's engagement. Manage a team up to 4 members, provide guidance support in task delivery & skillset improvement. Identify & develop required skillset that best fit for company & personal career path. Demand & Productivity driver 5 years or experience working in Data Engineer with 2 years at project lead level. Strong technical understanding & experience of data modeling, data warehousing architecture and ETL process. Strong programming skills (e.g., Python, SQL, ...) Strong Technical understanding of Big Data technology and open source system. Experience in hands-on, planning, organizing, and managing resource in deliver data warehouse project. Strong understanding of data quality delivery(term, process, framework, tools, ...). Well communicate skill with internal team and external client stakeholder. Experience with cloud computing platforms.Education Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology Engineer, or equivalent fields. Master’s degree in Computer Science, Financial analysis business fields (e.g. MBA, Finance, Business Analytics, etc.) would be considered as a strong plusKey Stakeholders Internal Data Platform team Regional Data Community of Practice  Prudential is an equal opportunity employer. We provide equality of opportunity of benefits for all who apply and who perform work for our organisation irrespective of sex, race, age, ethnic origin, educational, social and cultural background, marital status, pregnancy and maternity, religion or belief, disability or part-time / fixed-term work, or any other status protected by applicable law. We encourage the same standards from our recruitment and third-party suppliers taking into account the context of grade, job and location. We also allow for reasonable adjustments to support people with individual physical or mental health requirements.

136.job_description: Working for xspera, feels like coming home xspera, a globally operating management consultancy, seek to increase corporate performance through digital transformation. Xingate, xspera’s digital enterprise platform developed on Microsoft’s technology and collaboration stacks, deliver powerful intra, inter, and cross-departmental solutions for immediate results at affordable costs. xspera is seeking passionate Infrastructure (IT Administrator) who will maintain, upgrade, and manage our software, hardware, and networks. Resourcefulness is a necessary skill in this role. You should be able to diagnose and resolve problems quickly. You should also have the patience to communicate with a variety of interdisciplinary teams and users. Your goal will be to ensure that our technology infrastructure runs smoothly and efficiently.  Key responsibilities  General  SharePoint Installation & Configuration Manage system security, system patching and upgrades Install and configure software and hardware Manage network servers and technology tools Set up accounts and workstations Monitor performance and maintain systems according to requirements Troubleshoot issues and outages Ensure security through access controls, backups and firewalls Upgrade systems with new releases and models Develop expertise to train staff on new technologies Build an internal wiki with technical documentation, manuals and IT policies  Specific  Monitor and manage Network and Office Equipment. Support developers and office users to solve ad-hoc technical issues & problem Design and implement Network Topology On-premise and Azure cloud environment Design, implement and upgrade SystemActive Directory, Office 365, Exchange 2010-2013-2016, Skype for Business 2015, SharePoint 2010-2019, SQL 2012-2019, On- premise, Hybrid, and Azure environment, MS SQL BI, and K2 Design and implement SharePoint system topology On-premise, Hybrid, and Azure Cloud Propose technical solution, do estimates & detail plan for integration in internal & external environment. Apply MS Intune, PowerShell and ITIL service management.  Requirements  Qualifications  Bachelor/Master Degree in Information Technology, computer science, management information systems, or related field required English certificate of TOEIC 650+ or equivalent  Experience and skill  5+ year experience SharePoint Installation & Configuration including MinRole Farm Proven experience with configuration of load-balancing and High Availability Infrastructure Proven experience as a System Administrator, Network Administrator or similar role Proven experience and knowledge of system security (e.g. intrusion detection systems) and data backup/recovery Experience with databases, networks (LAN, WAN) and patch management Ability to create scripts in Python, Perl or other language Familiarity with various operating systems and platforms Resourcefulness and problem-solving aptitude Experience in working in an international environment Excellent communication skills Professional certification (e.g. MCSA Microsoft Certified Systems Administrator, MCSE Server Infrastructure, ITIL V4, etc.) is a plus  Why Work at xspera  Above market salary compensation, including 13-month pay Quarterly and yearly performance bonus compensation Annual performance reviews Personal development, training, and creative freedom Ability to participate in customer projects in EU, US & Asia Work in a global team with highly skilled and motivated people Spectacular company trips  About xspera As a management consulting company, xspera focus on the business goals of our customers. We deliver solutions which help customers achieve their business goals faster. Our enterprise platform, xingate, adapts quickly to our client’s corporate structures reducing their process costs in many areas by as much as 30% -60% through greater transparency, digitization, and process automation. Join xspera today and be part of the digital world of tomorrowjob overview location hcm, vietnamcontract type full timeexperience  salary range contact xsperajob level

As a senior member, your role is integral from the outset, serving as a trusted advisor to both clients and EPAM teams, bridging the gap between IT and business and demonstrating the ability to mentor junior levels. RESPONSIBILITIESConduct research and development to build innovative machine learning models and algorithms that drive business value Define stakeholders' needs and objectives and effectively communicate complex data and analytical insights through reports, dashboards or presentations Design, develop and deploy AI-driven applications, including chatbots using LLMs and Generative AI technologies Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements, design innovative AI models and integrate them into our existing systems Analyze and evaluate the performance of machine learning models and identify opportunities for improvement Help enhance our customer interaction capabilities and drive our AI strategy forward Stay up to date with the latest developments in data science and machine learning technologies and leverage them to improve the recommendation systems  REQUIREMENTSMore than 4 years of experience in Data Science with a bachelor's degree in computer science, statistics, mathematics or equivalent Proven experience in using Large Language Models (LLMs) such as GPT-3, GPT-4, etc Strong proficiency in Python and experience with machine learning frameworks and libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.) Hands-on experience with Generative AI technologies and frameworks like OpenAI, LangChain or similar Strong analytical skills with the ability to derive insights and communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders Fluency in both written and spoken English (B2)  WE OFFERBy choosing EPAM Vietnam, you're getting a
