roadmap to engineer your future & accelerate your journey At EPAM, you can find vast opportunities for self-development: access to over 25,000 online courses and libraries from industry leaders, English classes, mentoring programs, partial grants of certification, and experience exchange with colleagues around the world. You will learn, contribute, and grow with us

138.job_description: PropertyGuru is Southeast Asia’s leading PropTech company, and the preferred destination for over 34 million property seekers to connect with almost 55,000 agents monthly to find their dream home. PropertyGuru empowers property seekers with more than 2.8 million real estate listings, in-depth insights, and solutions that enable them to make confident property decisions across Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, and Vietnam.PropertyGuru.com.sg was launched in Singapore in 2007 and since then, PropertyGuru Group has made the property journey a transparent one for property seekers in Southeast Asia. In the last 16 years, PropertyGuru has grown into a high-growth PropTech company with a robust portfolio including leading property marketplaces and award-winning mobile apps across its core markets; mortgage marketplace, PropertyGuru Finance ; home services platform, Sendhelper ; a host of proprietary enterprise solutions under PropertyGuru For Business including DataSense , ValueNet , Awards , events and publications across Asia.  For more information, please visit: PropertyGuruGroup.com ; PropertyGuru Group on LinkedIn Role Specifics  As a Junior Software Engineer (GenAI Specialized), you will support the integration of AI technologies into our products. You will apply your foundational knowledge in computer science and machine learning to assist in developing, implementing, and refining AI-driven features. This role offers the opportunity to work with cutting-edge AI tools while growing your skills within a collaborative and fast-paced environment. Key ResponsibilitiesCollaborate with senior engineers and product teams to integrate AI features into our existing product suite. Assist in the development and implementation of AI-related algorithms, with a focus on Generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs). Support research and experimentation efforts aimed at improving AI model performance and scalability. Stay informed about the latest trends in AI and machine learning to contribute to innovative product ideas. Participate in coding, testing, and debugging tasks as part of the development lifecycle. Engage in team discussions and contribute to code reviews to help maintain a high standard of engineering excellence.  What We OfferCompetitive salary and benefits package. Opportunity to work with emerging AI technologies in the prop tech space. Collaborative, inclusive, and growth-oriented work environment. Opportunities for professional development and mentorship from experienced developers.  QualificationsBachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Basic understanding of computer science principles, including data structures and algorithms. Familiarity with Generative AI or large language models (LLMs) such as GPT, ChatGPT, BERT, etc. Proficiency in programming languages/frameworks such as Python, JavaScript/CSS/HTML, FastAPI, ReactJS, etc. Familiarity with machine learning frameworks and libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch). Strong problem-solving skills and a willingness to learn in a dynamic environment. Effective communication skills, both verbal and written.  Preferred QualificationsInternship or project experience in AI or machine learning. Experience with data science tasks such as data preprocessing or basic analytics. Experience working with various teams, such as product managers, designers, and others. Interest in the prop tech industry or a background in real estate technology.At PG, every Guru is guided by our comprehensive development map, which includes:Core Values  Own It & Deliver It; Respect & Care for Each Other; Have Fun & Celebrate Success  Push Beyond Good; Create What's NextLeadership Traits  Engaging in Courageous Conversations; Embracing Continuous Learning; Fostering Creative CollaborationsPropertyGuru Group is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive, innovative a learning environment with the best employees. Therefore, we provide employment opportunities without regard to gender, identity, race, religion, nationality, age, marital status, disability, or any other protected status, per applicable law. If there is anything we can do to help ensure you have a comfortable and positive interview experience, please let us know.

139.job_description: who will excel in this role?In love with database management? A well-organized person? An analytical and logical thinker?  YES?  Then this job is for you!where you can play to your strengths  We fully entrust you with these responsibilities:  Participate in the full lifecycle of database development and administration. Create detailed data models of the database covering logical and physical design patterns. Write complex SQL queries and stored procedures to implement business logic for new functionalities, enhancements, and maintenance. Debug and optimize database-related objects: index, partitioning, queries, stored procedures, and triggers. Monitor and optimize performance, produce metrics, and plan for disaster recovery. Perform database configuration, security, replication, backups, and scaling throughout the entire software development life cycle. Analyze, resolve, and correct database issues in real-time to ensure high-level of database performance and availability. Research, identify, and evaluate the latest database-related software and hardware components, technologies, and upgrades for implementation.Other duties and responsibilities will be assigned by direct Supervisor or Director/Unit Head conditionally.  your qualifications and skills  Good knowledge and experience in SQL database development: schema designing, queries, stored procedures, triggers, index, partitioning, and data manipulation techniques. Excellent SQL skills, with the ability to generate complex SQL queries. Proficient at adapting and tuning queries to enhance performance. Solid understanding of database structures, theories, principles, and practices. Knowledge of conceptual, logical, and physical database design. Experience in database troubleshooting and resolving database issues. Familiarity with backup and recovery technologies and methodologies. Good verbal/written communication and interpersonal skills. Able to quickly master business requirements and translate them to design and implementation. Ability to multi-task and context-switch effectively between different activities and teams. Effective time management and prioritization skills. Well-versed in fast-paced Agile environment.  BONUS POINTS  At least 1 year of experience in dealing with large and high volume transaction databases. Good at advanced technologies: high availability & disaster recovery, synchronization, integration, migration. Deep knowledge & practical experience in building and maintaining data warehouses. Experienced in architecting and implementing complex BI solutions.  Bachelor’s degree in IT/Computer Science or equivalent hands-on experience in software companies. At least 2+ years of proven experience in Database Administrator position. Good command of written and spoken English.  what you will enjoyCompetitive SalaryRewards & RecognitionsPremium HealthcareMeals & RefreshmentsTransparent Career PathTeam-building ActivitiesSport Facilities  where you will be working at SMS Tower  Lot 40, Quang Trung Software City, Tan Chanh Hiep Ward, District 12, Ho Chi Minh City

142.job_description: Who We Are:  At Brooks, we believe movement is the key to feeling more alive. That’s why we’re driven to create gear and experiences that take people to the place that makes them feel more alive — whether it’s a headspace, a feeling, or a finish line. Everyone who works at Brooks is propelled by a company culture that sparks excitement, fuels collaboration, inspires creativity, and ignites innovation. Our brand values help bond us together and drive our success:  Runner First We act in the best interest of the runner Word is BondWe do what we say we’ll do  Champion Heart We give our all in everything we do  There is no “I” in Run We stay generous with our humanity  Keep Moving We find ways to move every day, because joy is kinetic!We welcome everyone from every walk of life looking to inspire others through the power of movement — because we’re all moving towards something. Let’s run there. Your Job:  The Brooks innovation group is a team of world-class innovative minds collectively focused on improving the performance running experience through product, experiential and biomechanical innovation. They constantly challenge assumptions of how products are made and together they shape the future of running footwear. They stretch the limits of science and human performance with every innovation and are relentlessly focused on changes that benefit the Brooks runner. They pioneer relationships with manufacturing partners and suppliers, uncovering new partnerships with global industry leaders to create innovations and bring new Brooks innovations to life. The team operates across the full range of product creation, merchandising, brand strategy, sourcing and new business development to relentlessly pursue methods to make better-performing, higher-quality and sustainable products faster and more efficiently than ever before. As our Footwear Innovation Developer II, you will utilize your advanced product and process knowledge to lead and manage the product development of innovation programs that will drive the future of Brooks Running. Most of your focus and scope will be on Athlete projects and Track & Field products utilizing your expertise of plate development, injection molding, construction, composites, and applicable materials. You will create, manage, and lead project timelines across the innovation triad driving the research, prototyping and validation of ideas through the advanced R&D process delivering products directly to market and ready for in-line technologies. You will work with a global, cross-functional product creation team from the collection of insights through commercialization to deliver products that provide new running experiences and exceed runner expectations. You will lead the work with strategic partners outside of Brooks to cultivate new ideas and deliver groundbreaking products that challenge and shape the future of running.  In this role you will continue to learn from more senior members of the Footwear Innovation team to hone your technical footwear expertise. Your Responsibilities:Manage multiple innovation projects from Portfolio Review, Brief & Research through Design, Development & Validation and into Commercialization & Manufacturing Key counterpart to the US-based Developer as a liaison to Tier 1 and Tier 2 partners, engineering, costing, materials, testing lab, and manufacturing to ensure that products exceed runner expectations, are manufacturable and meet performance and quality expectations Create and execute project development plans / schedules according to the strategic critical dates that lead to on–time delivery of samples in support of key meetings and milestones including validation, technology transfers and final product/ technology confirmation Lead the prototyping, testing and validation of concepts through your advanced problem solving and product creation skills which include: pattern making and construction techniques; blueprints (technical packages), mold creation and midsole/ outsole making; Lab, fit, wear and biomechanical testing; and manufacturing processes used in the creation of our product Display an in-depth knowledge of the manufacturing process with the ability to manipulate it in order to advance and achieve new manufacturing techniques which enhance the overall performance and efficiency of product Act as a technical consultant to product teams on materials, components and construction decisions meet product’s functional goals, as well as assure product performance integrity through product testing (physical and field testing) Initiate and lead meetings with product teams during various phases of development to review, evaluate, update and ultimately drive the decision-making process that leads to on–time production confirmation and margin goals Possess a high aptitude for creative problem solving and critical thinking with a proven track record Explore and validate new materials, processes and technologies to ensure state-of-the-art shoe creation with the objective of maximizing runner experience and performance focused on Track and Field footwear and Elite Athlete racing Close collaboration with the Run Research team and creative thinking to translate new ideas and scientific data into concept creation and product implementation Lead and participate in development trips, 4 - 5 per year, to work with manufacturers and suppliers on existing and current development projects Explore and manage relationships with existing and new partners. Promote innovative thinking and approach within our external network. Create and build a knowledge base and stay informed about latest vendor capabilities and performance, factory relationships, quality issues, materials pricing and lead times. Work with the Innovation Manager to further define and implement the Innovation process with all its steps and milestones Qualifications:5+ successful years of experience leading the product development of high-performance footwear projects Bachelor’s Degree in English, Engineering, Design, Biomechanics or other applicable technical degrees or equivalent combination of education and/or experience Experience and technical knowledge in the development of composite plates, Track & Field, or cleated products is preferred. Having worked previously with athletes or sport science labs and genuine interest in the latest running research is a plus. Technical expertise in footwear product development with an advanced knowledge of the total footwear construction process including outsole/midsole drawing, pattern engineering, material construction, testing and costing. Strong understanding of manufacturing techniques, anticipating issues, problem solving with timely resolution. Proven track record of bringing creative ideas to the table and exploring innovative ways to build technically complex prototypes. Keen attention to detail in planning, organization and execution of tasks (self and through others), while still seeing the big picture and understanding how all of the pieces fit together and affect one another. Proven ability to lead and influence in collaborative, team oriented and complex global environments Demonstrated ability to develop highly productive relationships with individuals and teams that are made up of diverse disciplines and cultural backgrounds resulting in effective working relationships across the company Experience establishing and managing relationships with new and existing T1, T2 and T3 suppliers. Capable of communicating complex ideas and promoting innovative thinking in our partner network. Ability to anticipate how a decision made can affect our consumers, our partners, our products or other departments’ operations and/or morale; “connecting the dots.” Strong verbal and written communication skills in English, with an advanced ability to convey new ideas, concepts and functional expertise within project teams and to external stakeholders. Presentation skills including professional knowledge of PowerPoint, Illustrator or other electronic means to communicate new concepts or ideas preferred. Technical writing capability a plus. Curious and open minded; always open to be inventive and creative with the ability to challenge the status quo –always looking at improving our products and processes while also displaying a willingness to dive into the details. Strong computer skills including experience with Adobe Illustrator, MS Office software. Ability to travel domestically and internationally as needed, as well as organizing development and exploration trips. Passionate participation in Brooks’ sports activities a plus, overridden by the ability to understand and empathize with the runner in order to develop loyal, engaging relationships with our consumers and the Brooks community. 149.job_description: Department Engineering and TechnologyLevelExperienced (Individual Contributor)LocationVietnam - Ho Chi Minh City The Engineering and Technology team is at the core of the Shopee platform development. About the Team: The Product Development team in Vietnam focus on solving immediate needs of Shopee for Vietnam market in 3 main categories: Operation, Engagement, and Partnership. Requirements: Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science or related fields. Relevant experience in backend / server-side development. Familiar with commonly used languages, such as Golang / Python. Familiar with one of these stacks: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB. Passionate about coding and programming, innovation, and solving challenging problems. Experience in managing tasks, schedules, and conducting unit testing. Understanding of Computer Science fundamentals, including data structures and algorithms, operating systems, networks, databases… Familiar with common network protocols (TCP, UDP, HTTP) and network programming. Nice-to-have:Experience in web technologies and security. Experience with distributed systems, performance tuning, handling massive concurrency, and caching mechanisms. Experience with CI/CD pipelines, particularly using GitlabCI, or Github actions Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and ArgoCD for containerization and deployment. Experience with cloud services (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud). Understanding of how machine learning models can be integrated into backend systems. Contributions to open-source projects or a strong GitHub profile.

151.job_description: Payment Core Platform builds and operates Financial Core of Zalopay, serving as the central component of one of Vietnam's leading Payment Platform. Our primary responsibility is to handle various transaction processing and fund flows, including activities such as top-ups, withdrawals, transfers, and payments. With a focus on meeting stringent technical requirements, our system ensures a seamless and secure payment experience by delivering exceptional performance in terms of throughput, latency, availability, and scalability. Additionally, our team owns critical financial domains, including Accounting, Finance, and Business Operations. This involves managing user and partner funds, as well as maintaining daily records of Zalopay transactions in accordance with accounting standards. Through our efforts, Zalopay provides instant payment, money transfers, expedited operations, and top-level security measures. As a result, we play a crucial role in Zalopay's commitment to advancing a cashless society, delivering a wide range of services and enticing offers to our users. Responsibilities You will:Design, build, and maintain large-scale services, data pipelines, tooling, and systems to ensure a direct business impact in Zalopay’s mission-critical business domains including Product, Merchant, Accounting, Finance, and Business Operations. Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code using best practices. Debug and resolve complex issues that may arise in the system and address performance bottlenecks. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, and other engineers to define requirements and deliver high-quality solutions. Keep up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends in the industry and identify opportunities for improvement. Work in an Agile & collaborative environment involving different stakeholders. Be able to work in a high-pressure environment. Oversee end-to-end design and integration of our Payment Platform to meet highest standard, ensure application and fund security. Eliminate technical debt across core Zalopay system Yêu cầuHave a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. Have experience with distributed transaction algorithms such as TCC, SAGA, Two-Phase Commit. Have extensive experience working with databases and database transaction. Have in-depth knowledge of database design principles and performance optimization techniques. Have experience with distributed caching such as Redis, distributed locking such as ZooKeeper, and distributed event streaming platforms such as Kafka. Write high-quality & maintainable code. We work mostly in Java. However, languages are tools and we care more about your mindset & general engineering skills. Have implemented and delivered distributed systems on a large scale. Have experience in tracing system problems. Have experience in API design followed wellknown standard such as Google API Design Must have experience in state management and apply infinite state machine in practice  ### Nice to Have SkillsExperience with Java technologies: Spring Boot, Reactive Programming, Concurrent/Parallel Programming, Messaging Frameworks, etc. Experience in optimizing JVM. Experience with financial-related platforms/products is a plus. Knowing how to work with K8S or cloud services. Have a strong understanding of consensus algorithms, such as Paxos, Raft, or Practical Byzantine Fault Tolerance (PBFT). Good at English communication, both verbal and written

The team cultivates collaborations from a multidisciplinary team of strategists, analysts, creative technologists, product designers, copywriters, and art directors to create content, communications, and experiences across Vinamilk corporate brands, sub-brands, subsidiary brands and across platforms: posts, packaging, e-commerce, retail.We are seeking a Senior Brand Designer (multidisciplinary) to help us convey the brand spirit & vision through branding design (think packaging, merchandise, print, app/website, brand document, event...). This role will report to Head of Creative Art in Strategy & Innovation Office & Vinamilk’s Creative Director.If this is what you’re looking for – send us your portfolio featuring examples across a dynamic range of styles that show a craftsmanship attitude & clear design thinking.Main Responsibilities  Master brand gatekeeper: keep the standard of Vinamilk master brand & actively contribute new values to it. Keep master brand discipline when adapt it to all 33 sub-brands (product) design (can be direct design or working with design agency): packaging, official product asset (film, KV, photo library, social guide…) Execute design and conceptual tasks as assigned with significant attention to detail. Be an advocate for design; educating and enabling others to create on-brand experiences/design  Qualifications  5+ years' experience in a similar role Fluent in design tool: Adobe Suite (PS, ai, id) & Figma (if you are not familiar with Figma we can help) Solid skillset: critical thinking, design thinking, principles of design, conceptualize & branding. Ownership & strong communication skill (effectively communicate conceptual ideas and design rationale without fear). Detailed oriented (sloppiness doesn’t exist here) Passionate & Daring (to not only keep but & push the quality to the next level - Raise the bar spirit) Resilience Team player. Ready to lead & coach Junior/Mid-level designers to deliver projects with high quality. Quick learner - able to work independently, priorities accordingly, and iterate quickly (this is a very fast-paced/ challenging environment) Open to new challenges: work as multidisciplinary designer Commit to the deadline (on-time) Fluent in English is compulsory. Basic animation skill is a plus (not mandatory). Thanks for your attention and application!

Debug code in Python or C# as needed  Write and execute unit tests to ensure code quality and reliability. Phân tích keywords và tối ưu cho website: Keytool, Google Planner  . 4. Viết bài chuẩn SEO : Word, Exce  l 5. Biên tập, quản lý nội dung và hình ảnh cho fanpage  . 6. Quản lý các gian hàng thương mại điện t  ử nào đó thì có th  ể– Hướng dẫn  – Sử dụng các công cụ tìm kiếm & xây dựng bộ từ khóa chuẩn SEO cho từng sản phẩm, dịch vụ cụ th  ể – Đào tạo chuẩn SEO chi tiết từ tiêu đề, mô tả, cấu trúc bài viết, từ khóa, hashta  g – Xử lý hình ảnh chuẩn SEO, top Google tìm kiếm hình ản  h – Trực tiếp thực hành viết bài lên website đo hiệu quả bài viế  t – Được giao dự án cụ thể trực tiếp, hướng dẫn và giao các từ khóa để làm SEO top Google, cách kinh doanh Marketing Online, seeding mạng xã hộ  i – Tôn chỉ: Để nắm vững từng công việc Làm Việc Làm Việc & Làm Việ  c  THỎA THUẬN CHUNGCán bộ quản lý : Trưởng phòng1. Nhiệm vụ, quyền hạn: – Quản lý, thu thập, biên tập thông tin. Chịu trách nhiệm cập nhật tin tức lên website công ty, và quản lý các thông tin chào hàng trên Cổng Thương mại điện tử . – Lên kế hoạch, chương trình, nội dung phát huy hiệu quả của thông tin Marketing trên website công ty và Cổng thương mại điện tử , nâng cao khả năng quảng bá, xây dựng thương hiệu, truyền thông tích hợp quảng cáo, khuyến mãi, PR ngắn hạn và dài hạn . – Thu thập thông tin, đánh giá hiệu quả của hoạt động xây dựng thương hiệu, truyền thông, quảng cáo khuyến mãi, PR … – Phân tích thông tin, xử lý, cập nhật tin tức, tham mưu cho Trưởng phòn g – Quản lý, thu thập, biên tập và cập nhật tin tức lên website công ty. – Lên kế hoạch, chương trình, nội dung cho các hoạt động nhằm phát huy hiệu quả của website, thu hút khách hàng tìm đến với website của công ty, nâng cao khả năng quảng bá và xây dựng thương hiệu, truyền thông tích hợp, quảng cáo, khuyến mãi, PR ngắn hạn và dài hạn, đề xuất trình lên Trưởng phòng trình Giám Đốc duyệt . – Đề xuất nhân lực, tài lực, vật lực cho kế hoạch & tổ chức thực hiện chương trình được phê duyệt . – Phối kết hợp, đoàn kết và hỗ trợ các nhân sự thuộc Tiếp Thị (Marketing) cùng các nhân sự liên quan trong Công ty để hoàn thành nhiệm vụ chung . – Thực hiện đúng các quy chế, quy trình, quy định của Công ty và Tiếp Thị (Marketing) . – Báo cáo bằng văn bản hàng tuần cho người quản lý trực tiếp và các báo cáo tháng, quý, sơ kết 06 tháng, tổng kết năm theo quy định . – Thực hiện các công việc khác theo chỉ đạo của Trưởng phòng trong khuôn khổ phạm vi chức năng, nhiệm vụ, quyền hạn của Tiếp Thị (Marketing) . – Chịu trách nhiệm trước Trưởng phòng về toàn bộ kết quả và hiệu quả công việc được giao . – Ghi nhận yêu cầu, phối hợp thực hiện các công việc liên quan nghiệp vụ, chức năng, nhiệm vụ, quyền hạn, nhiệm vụ của đơn vị theo chỉ định. Báo cáo Trưởng phòng trước và sau khi thực hiện công việc . – Liên lạc với các đối tác liên quan tới vấn đề website và Cổng Thương mại điện tử theo định hướng của Tiếp Thị (Marketing). Báo cáo Trưởng phòng trước và sau khi thực hiện công việc . – Liên lạc với các công ty, thương hiệu khác trong các chương trình marketing phối hợp trên cơ sở các chương trình định hướng của đơn vị. Báo cáo TĐV trước và sau khi thực hiện công việc . 2. Yêu cầu:  – Trình độ: Đào tạo chuyên ngành báo chí, quản trị kinh doanh, truyền thông, marketing . – Tin học: Vi tính văn phòng, ưu tiên biết thêm lập trình web . – Thông qua các khóa huấn luyện về kinh doanh, marketing . – Thông qua các khóa huấn luyện về hệ thống quản trị chất lượng theo tiêu chuẩn  . – Năng lực tổng hợp và biên tập thông tin, trình bày văn bản, diễn đạt ngôn ngữ tốt . – Năng lực đàm phán, giao dịch với khách hàng, đối tác . – Khả năng tư duy sáng tạo, cảm nhận thẩm mỹ, thấu hiểu văn hóa kinh doanh . – Khả năng xử lý tình huống linh hoạt và mềm dẻo . – Khả năng truy cập internet, xử lý thông tin . – Khả năng làm việc tốt dưới áp lực cao . – Trung thự c – Ham học hỏ i – Năng động, sáng tạo, ứng biến tố t – Có khả năng làm việc độc lập và khả năng làm việc nhóm .QUYỀN LỢI ĐƯỢC HƯỞNG: Mức lương: 6-9 triệu + Thưởn g Được khẳng định bản thân trong môi trường năng động chuyên nghiệp. Cơ hội thăng tiến cao . Tăng lương định kỳ hàng năm tùy theo năng lực làm việc . Chế độ khen thưởng theo tháng, dựa trên thành tích công việc và theo tình hình kinh doanh của Công ty, thưởng theo đội nhóm, theo dự án……  Thông tin liên hệ  Sẽ có một buổi trao đổi với bạn tại công ty, 2 ngày để bạn tự thể hiện khả năng của mình, 3 ngày để training và trang bị vũ khí cho bạn. Has good knowledge of SQL, NoSQL database, able to write complex query. MongoDB is an advantage. Is comfortable or familiar with Docker. Has good problem-solving skills and is well versed in string / array manipulation. Good knowledge of git source control. Can learn new technology quickly. Working time: 9 am to 5 pm, Monday to Friday Extra paid day-off Địa điểm làm việc: TPHCM Lương: 15000K - 30000K VND một tháng Loại hình công việc: Thỏa thuận thời gian  Yêu cầu: Quyền lợi: Phúc lợi cao, Team Building, Thưởng Tháng 13 Hạn nộp: 2024-11-06 Kinh nghiệm: 2 - 3 năm Bằng cấp: Đại học Lĩnh vực: IT/CNTT -IT Phần mềm Số lượng cần tuyển: 1 Giới tính: Không yêu cầu

158.job_description: KMS Technology was established in 2009 as a U.S.-based software services company. With development centers in Vietnam and Mexico, we have been trusted globally for the superlative quality of our software consulting & development services, technology solutions, and engineers' expertise. We pride ourselves on creating brilliant solutions for our clients by leveraging deep expertise, advanced technologies, and delivery excellence for a shared success where everyone can reach their fullest potential. With three Business Lines:KMS Software: Leverage software domain expertise to help clients make better business decisions in technology platforms, increase speed-to-market, and gain critical development support through innovative technology solutions.  KMS Solutions: Empower BFSI businesses to embrace the digital finance revolution and expedite clients’ journey towards complete digitalization, technology consulting, data analytics, software development, and software quality.  KMS Healthcare: Build transformative next-gen technologies to solve healthcare’s most challenging problems, providing innovative tools and expertise to providers, payers, life sciences, and medical technology vendors.  Responsibilities  Develop new user-facing features using React.js. Build reusable components and front-end libraries for future use. Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code. Optimize components for maximum performance across various web-capable devices and browsers. Integrate RESTful APIs and manage state using Redux or similar libraries. Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to peers. Debug and fix bugs and performance issues in the application. Perform other tasks assigned by the Line Manager.  Qualifications  General requirements:  At least an intermediate skill level in English Likely having 2+ years of experience (flexible depending on how fast your learning and technical developing capabilities are)Technical requirements:  Strong experience in HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript/ES6 Good experience in React.js Experience in building a single page application including front-end routing, 2-way data binding, client-side rendering, and JSON-based RESTful APIs Experience with Responsive Layouts Experience with the Unit Test frameworks such as Karma/Mocha, Jasmine, QUnit Practice knowledge of website optimization techniques and fast page load times  Benefits and Perks  Perks You'll Enjoy  Working in one of the Best Places to Work in Vietnam Building large-scale & global software products Working & growing with Passionate & Talented Team Diverse careers opportunities with Software Outsourcing, Software Product Development, IT Solutions & Consulting Attractive Salary and Benefits Performance appraisal twice a year and performance bonus Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments in North American (U.S, Canada), Europe, Asia Flexible working time Various training on hot-trend technologies, best practices and soft skills Premium healthcare insurance for you and your loved ones Company trip, big annual year-end party every year, team building, etc. Fitness & sport activities: football, tennis, table-tennis, badminton, yoga, swimming… Joining community development activities: 1% Pledge, charity every quarter, blood donation, public seminars, career orientation talks,… Free in-house entertainment facilities (foosball, ping pong, gym…), coffee, and snack (instant noodles, cookies, candies…)  And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!

159.job_description: KMS Technology was established in 2009 as a U.S.-based software services company. With development centers in Vietnam and Mexico, we have been trusted globally for the superlative quality of our software consulting & development services, technology solutions, and engineers' expertise. We pride ourselves on creating brilliant solutions for our clients by leveraging deep expertise, advanced technologies, and delivery excellence for a shared success where everyone can reach their fullest potential. With three Business Lines:KMS Software: Leverage software domain expertise to help clients make better business decisions in technology platforms, increase speed-to-market, and gain critical development support through innovative technology solutions.  KMS Solutions: Empower BFSI businesses to embrace the digital finance revolution and expedite clients’ journey towards complete digitalization, technology consulting, data analytics, software development, and software quality.  KMS Healthcare: Build transformative next-gen technologies to solve healthcare’s most challenging problems, providing innovative tools and expertise to providers, payers, life sciences, and medical technology vendors.  Responsibilities  Responsibilities:  Work with US-based clients and Vietnam development to understand business needs and develop technical solutions to support DevOps needs in Vietnam team as well as US team. Deploy and maintain CI/CD pipelines across multiple environments Support and coordinate with cross-functional teams to deploy the latest technologies to deliver the product to global customers Deploy product updates, identify production issues, and implement integrations that meet customer needs Develop and improve business continuity planning and disaster recovery protocols for cloud-based systems Maintain/monitor/troubleshoot issues in the internal environments in the cloud. Develop new deployment pipeline for the core products to better control product quality, increase team’s productivity, accuracy and efficiency, and reduce product’s time to market Design, promote, support containers, microservices and cloud deployment on AWS and support repeatable and friction-less Continuous Integration Be responsible for building and running systems that make software engineering faster, better and safer Perform other tasks assigned by the Leader/ Manager.  Qualifications  General requirements:  Upper-intermediate level of English level Ability to obtain deep knowledge of the project technologies and work independently with minimum guidance Ability to handle multiple tasks, communicate effectively with team members and management. Good for logical thinking and problem solving. Ability to self-learn and adapt to new technologies quickly.Technical Requirements:  3+ years of experience of DevOps across all Phases of the software lifecycle Experienced working in an Agile, ITIL Process, fast-paced DevOps environment Experienced in designing scalable systems, cloud architecture (Azure/AWS), and ensuring high availability Proficient in building and managing CI/CD pipelines with tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI, or Azure DevOps Strong experience with DevOps tools (Terraform, Jenkins, Selenium, Docker, Kubernetes, Puppet, Ansible, Chef, etc.) Proficient in scripting languages (Python, Bash, or PowerShell) for automation Good knowledge of source control: Github, Gitlab, Bitbucket... Experience with system monitoring and troubleshooting using tools like ELK, Datadog, or similar  Benefits and Perks  BENEFITS & PERKS  Working in one of the Best Places to Work in Vietnam, Top 10 ITC Company in Vietnam Flexible working model: Flexible time & Hybrid working from Ho Chi Minh or Da Nang city or working remotely from any location in Vietnam Attractive Salary & Benefits, full salary in probation, social insurance on full gross salary Performance appraisal twice a year, 13th-month salary and performance bonus Premium healthcare insurance for you and your loved ones Working 5 days/week , from Monday to Friday 18+ paid leave days/year Diverse careers opportunities with Software Services, Software Product Development Working and growing in a values-driven, international working environment and standard Agile culture with passionate and talented teams Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments in U.S Various training on hot-trend technologies, best practices and soft skills Company trip, big annual year-end party every year, team building, etc. Fitness & sports activities: football, tennis, table tennis, badminton, yoga, swimming… Joining community development activities: 1% Pledge, charity every quarter, blood donation, public seminars, career orientation talks,… Free in-house entertainment facilities (football, ping pong, gym…), coffee, and snacks (instant noodles, cookies, candies…)  And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!

160.job_description: Murex is a global fintech leader in trading, risk management and processing solutions for capital markets. Operating from our 19 offices, 3 000 Murexians from over 60 different nationalities ensure the development, implementation and support of our platform which is used by banks, asset managers, corporations and utilities, across the world. Join Murex and work on the challenges of an industry at the forefront of innovation and thrive in a people-centric environment. You’ll be part of one global team where you can learn fast and stay true to yourself. Mission / Main focus: Support and contribute to Murex test process to ensure that Murex projects achieve their delivery quality objectives within time and cost constraints. Strong focus on automation with MXtest (Murex proprietary automation tool for MX.3). Support internal and external Clients on MXtest tool. Main activities to be performed. Build and maintain efficient and effective test suites by automating test scenarios following the testing standards and automation best practices.  Ensure availability of the testware before a test execution phase (test cases, test data, test environment, test tools, ...)  Execute automated test cases, logs results and rovide summary reports during the test execution phases in projects.  Develop technical and financial expertise on Murex product solutions through initial onboarding, on the job experience, and other learning opportunities.  Perform first level analysis when faced with an incident, track incident and follow informed resolution with corresponding stakeholders After developing necessary experience, additional activities to be performed: Contributes to test practice activities and knowledge sharing through knowledge base, collaboration, training, and communities of practice.  Contribute to the test closure activities by providing feedback, capitalizing test packages and documentations.  Support and guide clients on testing best practices and test tools usage, including reviewing test packages, and suggesting further developments. Interactions / Collaboration Usually works under supervision by senior Test Engineer or Test Lead - Partner with technical teams and key stakeholders from our APAC offices (Singapore, China, Hong Kong, Japan, Korea and Australia)  Collaborate with Project team to define and execute Murex test strategy.  Report MXtest issues to Product team and follow up till resolution After developing necessary experience: Collaborate with Client to train, support and advise on automation with MXtest Profile University degree in Computer science, computer engineering, mechatronics or equivalent  0-5 years of relevant professional experience  Basic knowledge on Unix/Linux shell and SQL  Prior experience on MXtest/MX.3 or similar software is a plus.  Strong command of English (Both spoken and written) is required as this role needs to liaise with global team and counterparties.  Basic communication and presentation skills  Curiosity and problem-solving mindset  Teamwork and cross group collaboration

161.job_description: Conduct in-depth interviews and workshops with clients to gather and document comprehensive business and system requirements. Create detailed requirement specifications, user stories, and acceptance criteria to guide the development process. Study business functions, gather information and evaluate output requirements to define clear operational objectives. Consolidate, analyze, elaborate, translate requirements into user stories and acceptance criteria. Then ensure the team understand the product requirements and the product is delivered at high quality. Compose and maintain requirement documents such as Business Requirement Document, Functional Requirement Specification. Collaborate with Software development team for clarifying and resolving their concern. Effectively communicate requirements and technical knowledge to the development team to ensure accurate implementation. Work with stakeholders to ensure that the final product meets all requirements and business objectives  Yêu cầu ﻿﻿Working Experience: A minimum of 2+ years of experience in business analysis or a similar role, preferably within AI products. Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and conceptual thinking skills to break down complex problems into manageable components. Knowledge of IT organization's core business processes, and the ability to elicit and analyze requirements. Skilled in designing, developing, and implementing software solutions, creating consistent specifications, and understanding application development and software development life cycle concepts. Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills to effectively interact with clients and internal teams. Collaboration: Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to achieve product objectives. Adaptability: Flexibility to adapt to changing business needs and product requirements. Documentation and Presentation: Proficiency in creating clear, concise, and visually appealing documents and presentations. Technical Aptitude: Familiarity with AI concepts and technologies is a plus. And Having Software Development Background is a big plus. Tools: Experience with Agile methodologies (e.g., Scrum), project management software (e.g., Jira), and diagramming tools. (e.g., draw.io)

162.job_description: Mô tả công việc: (Mức lương: 17 - 25 triệu VNĐ)  Loại hình công việc: Làm việc theo chế độ lao động chính thức, có ký Hợp đồng lao động, phép năm, BHXH, giờ hành chính 7:15- 16:00, từ thứ hai đến thứ bảy. Mô tả công việc: 1/ Lập kế hoạch, kiểm tra thực hiện bảo trì, cài đặt, đào tạo, hướng dẫn sử dụng các phần mềm văn phòng, phần mềm quản lý bệnh viện, hồ sơ bệnh án điện tử, đào tạo y khoa. 2/ Quản lý hệ thống website, phần mềm, đảm bảo sử dụng bình thường, giải quyết các vấn đề phát sinh 24/7. Cập nhật, lưu trữ, bảo mật, bảo vệ cơ sở dữ liệu của Công ty. 3/ Hỗ trợ người dùng xử lý các sự cố trong quá trình sử dụng máy tính, mạng, hệ thống email, phần mềm nội bộ. Làm việc với các nhà cung cấp dịch vụ và ứng dụng phần mềm. 4/ Hợp tác với các phòng ban có liên quan để hiểu được nhu cầu và tìm kiếm giải pháp CNTT thích hợp. 5/ Nghiên cứu, phát triển các quy trình, các giải pháp kỹ thuật, các dự án liên quan công nghệ thông tin, hướng đến công nghệ ảo, trí tuệ nhân tạo.  Chức vụ: Nhân Viên/Chuyên Viên  Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian  Quyền lợi được hưởng: 1/ Lương thỏa thuận + Thưởng + Phụ cấp công tác 2/ Cơ hội đào tạo, thăng tiến 3/ Môi trường làm việc thân thiện, trang thiết bị làm việc đầy đủ.  Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Đại Học  Yêu cầu công việc: 1/ Nam/nữ, tuổi 25-45. 2/ Học vấn: Đại học hoặc cao hơn, lĩnh vực phần mềm máy tính. Có các chứng chỉ về AI, machine learning, và công nghệ ảo hóa sẽ là một lợi thế (ví dụ: Google Cloud AI, Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate, VMware Certified Professional). 3/ Kinh nghiệm: tốt nghiệp loại khá, giỏi, hoặc kinh nghiệm từ 5 năm trở lên, ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm làm việc trong môi trường y tế. 163.job_description: Do you want to enhance society using your software development skills? Do you want to be part of a high-performance team providing new solutions to our engineering and consulting business all around the world?  We are Royal HaskoningDHV. Our purpose is to harness the power of data and software to deliver the environments of tomorrow. We’re using our engineering heritage to enhance society and create a more sustainable future.What will you do As a Full-Stack Software Engineer, you will be focussing on building apps with Python and VueJS, with opportunities to widen your responsibilities for using different technologies. Ideally, you have experience deploying cloud solutions as well.  About us At Royal HaskoningDHV, we combine the latest digital technologies with over 140 years of engineering experience to help clients in various industry sectors thrive in this new environment. We build a unique portfolio of software solutions aimed at enhancing our existing services, but also extending our services for with software solutions for e.g., ports, airports, or other physical assets. Through these solutions, we help our clients thrive in the ever more complex world, promoting safer, smarter, and more efficient processes tailored to their specific requirements.  About the team You will be part of a team of front-runners in the digital transformation of our company. We are experienced in delivering high-quality software solutions which support the business with automating processes, integrating different software solutions, and enabling them to work in a data-driven way. We are a multi-stack team, writing apps in Python, VueJS, but also with Kotlin and React. All our apps are hosted on Azure. Other technologies used are, e.g., Docker, Terraform and Sentry.  What you bring  You are a team player who has a flexible mindset while supporting the team in various ways. We value strong communicators who can work independently, contributing effectively to a growing team. Furthermore, you:  Have a minimum of 3 years of experience programming in Python and JavaScript / TypeScript. Experience with the Django Rest Framework (or other Python web frameworks). Have an excellent command of English. Experience with Azure or equivalent (or even a certificate). Experience with modern frontend frameworks (e.g., VueJS / React). Knowledge of docker is a plus. You have a bachelor’s in computer science or STEM-related disciplines and/or relevant experience. What we offer you  We are a professional organisation with appealing (inter)national projects and products. You will be working with experts who are leaders in their field in a multidisciplinary environment. We also offer you:  Attractive salary and benefits (13th month salary, yearly salary review). A good work-life balance. Premium healthcare insurance for you and your family members. Lifelong learning by offering you plenty of training & development opportunities. Excellent opportunities for development in both width and depth. Flexible working conditions. Opportunities for international projects. Budget and time for personal development and travel opportunities. Possibility to qualify for talent programs at different levels. Are you our new colleague?  Then we would like to meet you! Apply now by sending in your English CV using the button below.  Acquisition for this vacancy by agencies is not appreciated and offered candidates will not be taken into consideration.

165.job_description: FULL-STACK DEVELOPER, STAFF We are looking for a full-stack developer to join the high-performance software development team at Synopsys. The ideal candidate will have experience in both front-end and back-end development. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining complex web applications that leverage AI to deliver innovative solutions. The position offers opportunity to work on cloud-based applications infrastructure and various microservice architecture platforms and process automation using Python, JavaScript Frameworks, Golang, ELK  The ideal developer for this role is a problem-solver with an inquisitive and innovative mind, and loves to collaborate with other teams to drive the company forward.  Job Responsibilities  Design, develop, and maintain scalable web applications using modern front-end and back-end technologies Implement AI models and algorithms into web applications to enhance functionality and user experience. Collaborate with Agile Team and Business Users to deliver high-quality solutions. Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code, following best practices and coding standards. Develop and execute unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests to ensure the reliability and performance of applications. Manage the deployment of applications to production environments, ensuring scalability and security. Create and maintain technical documentation for code, APIs, and system architecture.Job Requirements  Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science. 7+ years of experience in fullstack software development. Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and frameworks such as React, Angular. Strong knowledge of server-side languages such as Node.js, Python, Golang, and experience with frameworks like Express, FastAPI/Django. Familiar with Redis/RabbitMQ. Proficiency in SQL and NoSQL databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Elasticsearch. Experience with containerization tools like Docker and Kubernetes, and familiar with Gitlab, Jenkins for CI/CD. Proficiency in Git and collaborative development workflows. Experience with AI/ML frameworks and libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, or Keras is a big plus. Knowledge of microservices architecture is a plus. Experience with agile development methodologies, i.e. Scrum, Kanban Strong problem-solving skills, excellent communication abilities, and a collaborative mindset Ability to multitask in a dynamic environment. Fluency in English (speaking, reading, writing) is a must.  Synopsys delivers the most trusted and comprehensive silicon to systems design solutions, accelerating technology innovation. We partner closely with our customers to maximize their R&D capability and productivity, powering innovation today that ignites the ingenuity of tomorrow. Companies trust Synopsys to pioneer new technologies to help them get to market faster without compromise.  Inclusion and Diversity are important to us. Synopsys considers all applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, military veteran status, or disability.

166.job: Chuyên viên Cao cấp Phân tích Giải pháp Dịch vụ CRM
166.job_description: Khối / Ban Khối Dịch vụ Công nghệ Ngân hàngLĩnh vực Công nghệ thông tinĐịa điểm Hồ Chí MinhLoại hình công việc Fulltime (toàn thời gian)Thời hạn ứng tuyển 25/10/2024Số lượng cần tuyển 1Mô tả công việc Mục tiêu: Chịu trách nhiệm (i) Phân tích tính năng sản phẩm và lộ trình phát triển giải pháp CRM cho các nghiệp vụ Dịch vụ (service); (ii) Phân tích yêu cầu nghiệp vụ và phối hợp triển khai các ứng dụng phần mềm CRM mua của bên thứ 3 hoặc tự phát triển ( in-house).  Trách nhiệm: Tiếp nhận, phân tích yêu cầu từ các bên liên quan và chuyển đổi thành các tài liệu kỹ thuật chi tiết (use case, flowchart, wireframe) để làm cơ sở phát triển hệ thống CRM; Tham gia vào quá trình thiết kế giải pháp, đưa ra các đề xuất cải tiến dựa trên hiểu biết sâu sắc về nghiệp vụ và hệ thống, đảm bảo giải pháp phù hợp với chiến lược sản phẩm và tối ưu nhu cầu của người dung; Làm việc chặt chẽ với đội ngũ phát triển để triển khai các tính năng mới, đảm bảo chất lượng, đúng tiến độ và đáp ứng yêu cầu; Thực hiện kiểm tra chất lượng, đánh giá hiệu quả sản phẩm và cung cấp dữ liệu để hỗ trợ Microservices Quản lý sản phẩm CRM đưa ra quyết định cải tiến; Quản lý và cập nhật các tài liệu liên quan đến dự án, bao gồm tài liệu yêu cầu, thiết kế và hướng dẫn sử dụng; Hỗ trợ trong việc đào tạo người dùng cuối, giải đáp thắc mắc và thu thập phản hồi để cải tiến hệ thống; Đảm bảo tất cả các tài liệu và thông tin liên quan đến dự án đều chính xác, rõ ràng và dễ hiểu. Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác theo phân công của cấp Quản lý.  Yêu cầu: Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành CNTT, Tài chính ngân hàng, Marketing; Tối thiểu 7 năm (chuyên gia)/5 năm (chuyên viên cao cấp)/3 năm (chuyên viên chính)/2 năm (chuyên viên) kinh nghiệm lĩnh vực ngân hàng, ưu tiên kinh nghiệm tham gia các dự án triển khai hệ thống CRM hoặc tham gia các dự án liên quan đến xây dựng các giải pháp marketing automation; Kinh nghiệm làm việc với các giải pháp công nghệ mới như Gen AI, Chat Bot/Call Bot/ Business Rule Engine (Low code/No-code), Ekyc, Video-Kyc, Digital scoring…; Thành thạo các công cụ phân tích dữ liệu như SQL, Python, R, Tableau, Power BI và các công cụ phân tích dữ liệu lớn; Hiểu biết về công nghệ: Kiến thức về các công nghệ liên quan đến CRM, API, tích hợp hệ thống, cũng như các quy định về bảo mật và tuân thủ; Am hiểu các sản phẩm ngân hàng, sản phẩm tài chính, kinh nghiệm thực hiện các dự án liên quan các giải pháp CRM trong ngân hàng, kiến thức về các quy trình truyền thông, bán hàng và dịch vụ khách hàng; Khả năng tổng hợp báo cáo, phân tích dữ liệu, xu hướng khách hàng và hiệu suất sản phẩm để đưa ra các đề xuất cải tiến tính năng, quy trình sản phẩm dịch vụ; Kỹ năng làm việc nhóm, chịu áp lực tốt với nhiều dự án và yêu cầu ưu tiên cùng lúc; Kỹ năng sử dụng các phần mềm tin học văn phòng thành thạo; Kỹ năng Tiếng Anh giao tiếp, đọc hiểu tốt

167.job_description: CVRM Account Specialist - HCMAbout AstraZeneca and AstraZeneca VietnamAstraZeneca AstraZeneca (LSE/STO/Nasdaq: AZN) is a global, science-led biopharmaceutical company that focuses on the discovery, development, and commercialization of prescription medicines in Oncology, Rare Diseases and BioPharmaceuticals, including Cardiovascular, Renal & Metabolism, and Respiratory & Immunology. Based in Cambridge, UK, AstraZeneca operates in over 100 countries and its innovative medicines are used by millions of patients worldwide. Please visit astrazeneca.com and follow the Company on Twitter @AstraZeneca.AstraZeneca Vietnam As a Foreign Invested Enterprise with over 600 members, AstraZeneca is investing into Vietnam 360 million USD from 2020 to 2030 with a focus on reducing the burdens of non-communicable diseases, developing local talent, and uplifting the domestic biopharmaceutical R&D and manufacturing capabilities.  Over the last three decades accompanying Vietnam’s sustainable development, AstraZeneca has run several impactful programmes in collaboration with the Government, Ministry of Health and healthcare partners to promote disease awareness, prevention and early detection. In recent years, AstraZeneca Vietnam has received several certificates of merit from the Prime Minister and Minister of Health, for excellent contributions to Vietnam’s vaccine diplomacy, fight against COVID-19 and advancement of cancer treatment and disease awareness. The company has also been recognized among Vietnam’s Top 100 Best Places to Work (2018 – 2023) with various other industry awards from BritCham, EuroCham, and government agencies.What you’ll do  Job Description / CapsuleTechnical expert of specific company products, therapeutic classes or patient needs. Typically establishes long-term relationships with key customers. Develop and manage commercial relationships and agreements with major public/private hospital groups and with major industrial accounts to maximize the business for AstraZeneca. Interact with key customers in a highly scientific manner to effectively educate and engage healthcare professionals. Successfully complete all training requirements, including product examinations before starting the job Typical Accountabilities (bullet point list)  1/ Territory management  Engage healthcare professionals in dialogue about approved indications and product efficacy/safety profiles to support on-label prescribing for appropriate patients. Work with the Line Manager to develop a local strategy and business plan to meet or exceed performance and call execution goals in the assigned territory. Drive performance and ensure forecasts and assigned budgets to meet or exceed therapeutic and territory expectations. Develop and maintain in-depth knowledge of the market, demographics, and managed market information relative to assigned territory. 2/ Customer management  Identify Key Decision makers. Maintain good relationships with key customers. Ensure that AZ product input listing aligns with BU objective. Keep updating market and customer information. 3/ Key account business planning  Regularly monitor business performance to ensure performance is in line with objectives. Provides immediate solutions to address sudden changes in the market behaviour of targeted accounts. 4/ Compliance  Comply with all regulations and compliance including interactions with healthcare professionals, distribution of samples, etc. Education, Qualifications, Skills and Experience  Essential  Bachelor’s degree in pharmacy/medicine. At least 2 years’ experience in pharmaceutical field. Excellent negotiation skills. Good business sense. Initiative and enthusiasm. Good communication and interpersonal skills. The ability to work effectively under pressure. Desirable  Experience in similar position in MNC Pharmaceutical company Key Relationships to reach solutions  Internal (to AZ or team) Marketing, Medical, RAMA, GA, FinanceExternal (to AZ) Key opinion leaders, Director Boards, Health Insurance doctors, medical societies, regulatory body, healthcare associations, Pharmacists, distributorWhy AstraZeneca?Be bold and make a powerful impact: AstraZeneca is a world-leading business where standards are high and challenges complex, but also a collective where we build, support and motivate each other. This unique combination of strong expectation and empowerment invites you to improve how our markets work and make your individual mark. Here, you can follow your ambitions with full confidence. As part of a responsible, value-led business with a strong sustainability agenda, you can also help impact the future beyond business projects.  Be part of our growth journey and success story: Join the fastest growing pharmaceutical company in our markets, set up to fuel further growth. Make the most of our assets: our strong heritage, our early investment and commitment in emerging markets, and how we embrace digital and data to transform the patient journey. Go beyond your limits. Welcome failure as a chance to learn. There’s no better place to feel inspired, energised and try new things.  Learn and grow by embracing diverse opportunities: Experience an organisation where professional development is prized and nurtured. Access the tools and support you need to continuously learn. Then it’s up to each of us to step up, speak up and show what we can do. Take advantage of working in a global business with opportunities to move beyond your role and open international doors. At AstraZeneca, your future is in your own hands.  Urgently bring our leading pipeline to millions of patients in need: Seize the opportunity to help improve the lives of millions of patients, including in areas where patient needs are often unmet. Work with our transformative pipeline to help bring a variety of high-quality medicines to market – and ensure they are made easily accessible to as many patients as possible.  Be heard in a culture of local empowerment: AstraZeneca is set up for creativity. We encourage unity and ownership at a local level, with collaboration across the global organisation. We tailor how we work, adapting to our markets and healthcare systems. In our diverse community, every voice is important. Share your ideas and opinions openly. In our speak-up culture, the way we communicate with each other leads to more powerful innovation.So, what’s next? If you are already inspiring yourself to join our dream team, we can’t wait to hear from you. If you are ready to bring new insights and fresh thinking to the table, Brilliant! We have one seat available, and we hope it’s yours. If you’re curious to know more then please take initiative to recruitment.Vietnam@astrazeneca.com. We encourage your application.Where can I find out more?  Visit our website www.astrazeneca.vn Follow us on LinkedIn www.linkedin.com/company/astrazeneca/ and Facebook https://www.facebook.com/AstraZenecaVN Contact us via recruitment.Vietnam@astrazeneca.com
